Jiājiǎnchéngchú shì zuì jīběn de yùnsuàn fǎzé。

另有乘除，别有耳目。

他是个多才多艺的学生，为我们赢得了许多荣誉。
If it be a sin to covet honor, I am the most sinning soul alive.
Rúguǒ shuō xiàngwǎng róngyù shì yì zhǒng zuìguò，nàme wǒ jiùshì huózhe de zuìwéi zuì\'è de línghún。
如果说向往荣誉是一种罪过，那么我就是活着的最为罪恶的灵魂。
The Nobel Prize has become the tiptop glory of science.
诺贝尔奖已成为全世界公认的自然科学的最高荣誉。
If someone is under a cloud, they are not trusted or not popular because people think they have done something bad.
一个人如果名誉扫地了，那么他就再不会得到信任，也不再受欢迎，因为所有人都觉得他做了错事。
败坏名誉
bàihuài míngyù 
discredit; defame
保全名誉
bǎoquán míngyù 
preserve one\'s reputation
恢复名誉
huīfù mínɡyù 
rehabilitation (of a person\'s reputation)
毁坏名誉
huǐhuài mínɡyù 
ruin sb.\'s reputation
不计毁誉
bújì huǐyù 
be indifferent to people\'s praise or blame
毁誉不一。
Huǐyù bùyī。
Evaluations differ widely.
猎取廉价的声誉
lièqǔ liánjià de shēngyù 
make a bid for cheap popularity
名誉好
míngyù hǎo 
have a good reputation; be of high repute; be held in high esteem
弄虚作假，骗取荣誉
nòngxūzuòjiǎ，piànqǔ róngyù
seek honour through fraud and deception
被聘为名誉会长
bèi pìnwéi míngyù huìzhǎng
be invited to be honorary chairman
破坏名誉
pòhuài mínɡyù
damage sb.\'s reputation
荣誉感
róngyùgǎn
a sense of honour
为祖国赢得荣誉
wèi zǔguó yíngdé róngyù
win honour for one\'s country
爱护集体的荣誉
àihù jítǐ de róngyù
cherish the good name of the collective
应得的荣誉
yīngdé de róngyù
an honour that one well deserves
名誉扫地
míngyù sǎodì
be thoroughly discredited
维护国家的声誉
wéihù guójiā de shēngyù
defend the honour of one\'s country
在国内外享有很高的声誉
zài guónèiwài xiǎngyǒu hěn gāo de shēngyù
enjoy great prestige both at home and abroad
中国丝绸在世界上素有盛誉。
Zhōngguó sīchóu zài shìjiè shàng sù yǒu shèngyù。
Chinese silk has long been famous all over the world.
抬高声誉
táigāo shēngyù
raise sb.\'s reputation
名誉所系
míngyùsuǒxì
have a direct bearing on one\'s reputation
享誉海内外
xiǎnɡ yù hǎi nèi wɑi
enjoy great prestige both at home and abroad
享有很高的国际信誉
xiǎngyǒu hěn gāo de guójì xìnyù
enjoy high international prestige
名誉学位
mínɡyù xuéwèi
an honorary degree
扬誉全球
yánɡyù quánqiú
become world-famous
溢誉
yìyù 
excessive praise
我们的产品饮誉全球。
Wǒmen de chǎnpǐn yǐnyù quánqiú。
Our products are popular all over the world.
誉不绝口
yùbùjuékǒu 
praise profusely; be full of praise
代表团载誉而归。
Dàibiǎotuán zàiyù ér guī。
The delegation returned with many honors.
这个厂的产品质量赢得了用户的赞誉。
Zhège chǎng de chǎnpǐn zhìliàngyíngdé le yònghù de zànyù。
The factory has been commended by the consumers for the high quality of its products.
追求名誉地位
zhuīqiú míngyù dìwèi 
be after fame and position
声誉
shēngyù
reputation; fame; prestige
名誉
míngyù
fame; reputation
整个公司的信誉都给他们搞得扫地以尽了。
Zhěnggè gōngsīde xìnyù dōugěi tāmen gǎode sǎodìyǐjìn le。
这是蒙牛乳业荣誉出品的。
Zhè shì Měngniúrŭyè róngyùchūpǐn de。
他特别爱重自己的声誉。
Tā tèbié àizhòng zìjǐ de shēngyù。
He cares a great deal about his reputation.
为了名利，他不惜毁身拜誉。
Wèile mínglì，tā bùxī huǐshēn bàiyù。
To get that honor, he ruined his own reputation.
环卫工人被誉为是城市美容师。
Huánwèi gōngrén bèi yùwéi shì chéngshì měiróngshī。
City sanitation workers are called &quot;city beauticians&quot;.
经过多年的努力，该品牌已经驰誉全国了。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，gāi pǐnpái yǐjing chíyù quánguó le。
After years of hard work, the brand earned a good reputation all over the country.
银行说他信誉差，不放贷给他。
Yínháng shuō tā xìnyù chà，bú fàngdài gěi tā。
The bank denied his request for a loan due to his bad credit.
这片丰腴的土地，自古以来就有“粮米之仓”的美誉。
Zhè piàn fēngyú de tǔdì，zìgǔ yǐlái jiù yǒu“liángmǐ zhī cāng”de měiyù。
This abundant land has been honored as &quot;the store of grain and rice&quot; since ancient times.
王洛兵被誉为“西部歌王”。
Wáng Luòbīng bèi yùwéi“xībùgēwáng”。
Wang Luobing is acclaimed as the folk song king of the northwest.
江苏省常熟市被誉为“古琴之乡”。
Jiāngsū Shěng Chángshú Shì bèi yùwéi“gǔqín zhī xiāng”。
Changshu City in Jiangsu province was awarded the title of &quot;the home of the Guqin&quot;, which is a seven-string plucked instrument.
我的这点成绩哪值得如此夸奖，先生过誉了。
Wǒ de zhè diǎn chéngjì nǎ zhídé rúcǐ kuājiǎng，xiānshēng guòyù le。
You flatter me, me achievements are not worthy of such praise.
这片山坡因盛产水果而被誉为花果山。
Zhè piàn shānpō yīn shèngchǎn shuǐguǒ ér bèi yùwéi huāguǒshān。
This area of hillside is famed as the &quot;Flower and Fruit Mountain&quot; because it is abundant of fruits.
杭州盛产茧丝制品，被誉为丝绸之乡。
Hángzhōu shèngchǎn jiǎnsī zhìpǐn，bèi yùwéi sīchóu zhī xiāng。
As a city teeming with products made of cocoon silk, Hangzhou is titled the hometown of silk.
连史纸早在元代就被誉为“妍妙辉光、皆世称也”的精品，至今已有600多年的历史。
Liánshǐzhǐ zǎo zài Yuándài jiù bèi yùwéi“yánmiàohuīguāng、jiēshìchēngyě”de jīngpǐn，zhìjīn yǐ yǒu liùbǎi duōnián de lìshǐ。
Lianshi Paper was famed as a delicate object that was &quot;Beautiful, fine, bright, smooth and was widely praised.&quot;  So far it has already had a history of more than 600 years.
那些说我坏话的人是在侵害我的名誉权！
Nàxiē shuō wǒ huàihuà de rén shì zài qīnhài wǒ de míngyùquán！
Those speaking evil of me infringe on my right of reputation.
作弊抄袭的事情一经暴露，立刻使他名誉扫地。
Zuòbì chāoxí de shìqing yìjīng bàolù，lìkè shǐ tā míngyù sǎodì。
The disclosure of cheating, and plagiary discredited him thoroughly.
这种没有信誉保证的皮包商，你千万别信他！
Zhèzhǒng méiyǒu xìnyù bǎozhèng de píbāoshāng，nǐ qiānwàn bié xìn tā！
Don\'t believe any fly-by-night company, they all lack credibility.
我久闻先生的清誉，十分敬仰。
Wǒ jiǔwén xiānshēng de qīngyù，shífēn jìngyǎng。
I\'ve been hearing about your unblemished reputation for a long time, and greatly respect you.
这次集体活动的主要目的是培养学生们的国家荣誉感。
Zhècì jítǐ huódòng de zhǔyào mùdì shì péiyǎng xuéshengmen de guójiā róngyùgǎn。
The main purpose of this collective activity is to instill a sense of national honor in the students.
这种交易虽然不会挣来多少实益，却能为我们换得良好声誉。
Zhèzhǒng jiāoyì suīrán búhuì zhènglái duōshǎo shíyì，què néng wèi wǒmen huàndé liánghǎo shēngyù。
Such trade fairs can\'t bring us too many practical benefits, but they can earn us a good name.
《史记》被鲁迅先生誉为“史家之绝唱，无韵之离骚”。
《Shǐjì》 bèi Lǔ Xùn xiānsheng yùwéi “ shǐjiā zhī juéchàng，wú yùn zhī lísāo ”。
这条街专卖小食，所以被誉为“小吃第一街”。
Zhè tiáo jiē zhuānmài xiǎoshí，suǒyǐ bèi yùwéi“xiǎochī dìyī jiē”。
This street is famous for its snacks and is honored as &quot;the first snack street&quot;.
任何学生都应该以学校为荣，不做影响校誉的事。
Rènhé xuésheng dōu yīnggāi yǐ xuéxiào wéiróng，búzuò yǐngxiǎng xiàoyù de shì。
All the students should be proud of their school and not do things that endanger the school\'s reputation.
玄武后来被誉为神的化身。
Xuánwǔ hòulái bèiyùwéi shén de huàshēn。
他为人高洁，雅誉远播，大家都很喜欢他。
Tā wèirén gāojié，yǎyù yuǎnbō，dàjiā dōu hěn xǐhuan tā。
He has a noble character and a good reputation. Everybody likes him.
言必信，行必果，信誉很重要啊。
Yán bì xìn，xíng bì guǒ，xìnyù hěn zhòngyào a。
One must be true in word and resolute in deed. One\'s reputation is important.
虽然身上有伤，但为了荣誉，他还是硬俉到底。
Suīrán shēnshàng yǒu shāng，dàn wèi le róngyù，tā háishi yìngwú dàodǐ。
Though bodily injured, he held on to the end for honour.
台湾、香港、韩国、新加坡被誉为亚洲四小龙。
Táiwān、Xiānggǎng、Hánguó、Xīnjiāpō bèi yùwéi yàzhōu sì xiǎo lóng。
Taiwan, Hong Kong, Korea and Singapore are praised as the four rising powers of Asia.
他自誉为艺术界一代宗师。
Tā zì yùwéi yìshùjiè yídài zōngshī。
In art circles, he praised himself as this generation\'s master.
南开大学作为一个综合大学在国际上享有盛誉。
Nánkāi dàxué zuòwéi yígè zōnghé dàxué zài guójìshàng xiǎngyǒu shèngyù。
Nankai University is well-known around the world as a comprehensive university.
这间旅行社的声誉很好。
Zhè jiān lǚxíngshè de shēngyù hěnhǎo。
This travel agency enjoys a good reputation.

Xuānwǔ hòulái bèi yùwéi shén de huàshēn。

If someone is under a cloud, they are not trusted or not popular because people think they have done something bad.

他是个多才多艺的学生，为我们赢得了许多荣誉。
He has the distinction of being very generous to those in need.

他得到了荣誉，因为他对那些需要帮助的人慷慨善良。
He lectured extensively, travelling a great deal and earning international acclaim.
Tā sìchù yǎnjiǎng，dàoguò hěnduō dìfang，bìng yíngdéle guójì zànyù。
他四处演讲，到过很多地方，并赢得了国际赞誉。
They say the nearest alternative school is too far away and has a poor reputation.

他们说最近的另一家可选择的学校离得非常远，而且声誉不好。
He has bid for Olympic glory her whole life.
Tā de yìshēng dōu zài wèi àoyùnhuì de róngyù ér nǔlì。

He was made chancellor of the University of Oxford.

If it be a sin to covet honor, I am the most sinning soul alive.
Rúguǒ shuō xiàngwǎng róngyù shì yì zhǒng zuìguò，nàme wǒ jiùshì huózhe de zuìwéi zuì\'è de línghún。
如果说向往荣誉是一种罪过，那么我就是活着的最为罪恶的灵魂。
He lectured extensively, travelling a great deal and earning international acclaim.
Tā sìchù yǎnjiǎng，dàoguò hěnduō dìfang，bìng yíngdéle guójì zànyù。
他四处演讲，到过很多地方，并赢得了国际赞誉。
He corrupted my reputation by spreading false rumours about me.
Tā tōngguò sànbō xūjiǎ yáoyán lái sǔnhài wǒ de míngyù。
他通过散播虚假谣言来损害我的名誉。

He never courts publicity.

他不受欢迎，备受指责；他已经名誉扫地了。

a presumptuous act

刻在竹片上的简牍被考古学家送往研究所研究。

竹管
每枚竹钉大约要削上十几刀，刀刀要恰到好处，也不是件容易的事情。
Měi méi zhúdìng dàyuē yào xuē shàng shíjǐ dāo，dāodāo yào qiàdào hǎochǔ，yě búshì jiàn róngyì de shìqing。
Every bamboo nail has been cut more than ten times. It is difficult to make every cut right.
她有一把用细竹篾编成的扇子，篾工细密极了。

biānzhì zhúqì

The boxer was knocked down to the canvass.
Zhè wèi quánjīshǒu bèi dǎdǎo zài Quánjīchǎng shàng。
这位拳击手被打倒在拳击场上。
The pedestrians pummeled the demonstrators.
Zhèxiē xíngrén yòng quántou měngdǎ shìwēizhě。
这些行人用拳头猛打示威者。
One man calls another a fool, and at this the other stands up and clenches his fist and lands a blow on his nose.
Yí gè rén jiào lìng yí gèrén shǎguā，yúshì tā jiù zhàn qǐlái，wò jǐn quántou cháozhe nàgè rén de bízi dǎle yì quán。
一个人叫另一个人傻瓜，于是他就站起来，握紧拳头朝着那个人的鼻子打了一拳。
The boxer was knocked cold.
拳击手被打昏了。
He was knocked down with one uppercut.
Yí gè shànggōuquán jiù bǎ tā dǎdǎo le。
一个上钩拳就把他打倒了。
At first they had an argument, but then Jack started belting him in the face.
起初他们只是争吵，但后来杰克照他脸上打了一拳。
He landed a blow on the Italian\'s chin.
他在那个意大利人的下颌上打了一拳。
I wanted to walk up to him and punch him in the chops.
Wǒ hěn xiǎng zǒu shàngqián qù，hěnhěn wǎng tā liǎnshàng dǎshàng yì quán。
我很想走上前去，狠狠往他脸上打上一拳。
Sam was punched in the face by Ruby.
Sàmǔ bèi Lùbǐ zài liǎnshàng dǎle yì quán。
萨姆被露比在脸上打了一拳。
The boxer was taken down with one swift uppercut to the chin.
Zhège quánshǒu bèi yí jì kuàisù de shànggōuquán jīzhòng xiàba，dǎdǎo le。
这个拳手被一记快速的上勾拳击中下巴，打倒了。
He landed several blows on his opponent\'s head.
Tā duìzhe duìshǒu de nǎodai dǎle jǐ quán。
他对着对手的脑袋打了几拳。
He made a thrusting motion with his fist.
Tā yòng quántou zuòle yí gè jīdǎ dòngzuò。
他用拳头做了一个击打动作。
I bloodied my fists on the faces of those whom I didn\'t like.
Wǒ yòng quántou bǎ nàxiē wǒ bù xǐhuan de rén dǎ de mǎn liǎn shì xuè。
我用拳头把那些我不喜欢的人打得满脸是血。

quánquánzhīchén
sincere intention; sincerity
经过一番恶斗，拳坛又诞生了新拳王。
Jīngguò yìfān èdòu，quántán yòu dànshēng le xīn quánwáng。

车式形意拳十分注重技击，是很难学的拳法。

他打拳练武是为了强壮身体、疏通气脉。

左右钩拳交替使用，直到害怕的裁缝跌倒在地。
Do not attempt to sweep or hook a solidly planted opponent.

不要试图横扫或用勾拳攻击一名顽强的对手。

The Hope Primary School used the grant to rebuild its schoolhouses.
我们学校的锅炉房离宿舍太远了，打趟水要走好久。

The school published a special report with a whole page about his deeds, to praise his spirit of sacrifice for the sake of others.

Would you care to come with me to my place for a chat and have something to eat?

qǐqiú shīshě
beg for alms
靠别人施舍过日子
kào biérén shīshě guòrìzi
survive on handouts
学生宿舍
xuésheng sùshè
students\' hostel (or dormitory)
职工宿舍
zhígōng sùshè
living quarters for staff and workers

Yào shě de xià běnqián péiyǎngréncái。

屋舍俨然
wūshè yǎnrán
houses set out in neat order
他们多年相处，一旦分别，不免依依不舍。
Tāmen duōnián xiāngchǔ，yídàn fēnbié，bùmiǎn yīyībùshě。
After being together for years, they can\'t bear to part from each other.
这间宿舍因遗留火种阴燃发生大火。

The dormitory building burned down when some smouldering cinders burst into flame.

shèyúdēngzhōu
change from a carriage to a boat

Lǎotàitai chěqǐ dōnglínxīshè de xiánshì，zǒngshì bú zhùzuǐ。
The old woman would keep on and on gossiping about her neighbours.
追随不舍
zhuīsuí bùshě 
follow sb. closely
寒舍
hánshè
my humble home (or abode)
驽马千里，功在不舍。
Númǎqiānlǐ，gōngzàibùshě。
If a nag travels a thousand li, it\'s only through perseverance.
舍身
shěshēn
give one\'s life; sacrifice oneself
她舍不得扔掉那些已经败谢的玫瑰。
Tā shěbùdé rēngdiào nàxiē yǐjing bàixiè de méiguī。
She is unwilling to throw away those withered roses.

Tāmen liǎnggè zài chángtíng sòngbié，yīyībùshě。
They parted at the pavilion, hating to leave each other.
这双长筒靴太贵了，我舍不得买。
Zhèshuāng chángtǒngxuē tài guì le，wǒ shěbùdé mǎi。
I don\'t want to spend so much money on this pair of long boots.
小姑就要出门子了，大家都舍不得她。
Xiǎogū jiùyào chūménzi le，dàjiā dōu shěbùdé tā。
My sister-in-law will get married soon, but none of us are able to leave her.
进出宿舍要带出入证，这是为学生的安全着想。
Jìnchū sùshè yào dài chūrùzhèng，zhè shì wèi xuésheng de ānquán zhuóxiǎng。
When you leave or enter the dormitory you must have a pass, this is for the safety of the students.

咱们东邻西舍应该互相帮助。
zánmen dōnglín xīshě yīnggāi hùxiāng bāngzhù。
We neighbors should help each other.
这里真是洞天福地，让人舍不得离去。
Zhèlǐ zhēnshi dòngtiān fúdì，ràng rén shěbùdé lí qù。
It is such a charming place that nobody is willing to leave.

Dìzhèn hòu de chóngjiàn gōngzuò hěn shùnlì，dàjiā fēnfēn gài qǐ le xīn de fángshě。

同宿舍的其他人都已放弃考研，就剩我一人孤军奋战。

qièchǐ tònghèn
gnash one\'s teeth in hatred

The people I respect are straightforward ones; the ones I hate are snobs.
做人不能太势利眼了，嫌贫爱富的人让人痛恨。

One shouldn\'t be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.

The newly appointed high officials hate reforms.

Tā míngmiàn shàng shuō méi wǎng xīnlǐ qù，kě shíjìshàng què huáihèn zài xīn。
It seems that he doesn’t mind, but in fact, he harbored a deep resentment.
他含恨抱冤却无处可诉。
Tā hánhèn bàoyuān què wúchù kěsù。
Though he feels strongly aggrieved, he has nowhere to complain to.
我恨不得明天就长大，这样可以工作，照顾家里。
Wǒ hènbùdé míngtiān jiù zhǎngdà，zhèyàng kěyǐ gōngzuò，zhàogù jiā lǐ。
I\'m dying to grow up, and work to feed my family.
如果社会上人人都可以兼爱，那这个世界就不会再有恨了。
Rúguǒ shèhuìshàng rénrén dōu kěyǐ jiānài，nà zhège shìjiè jiù búhuì zài yǒu hèn le。
There would be no hatred if everyone gave universal love to each other.
可恨
最可恨的莫过于秦桧之流。
可恨的卖国贼。
你虽然伤害过他，可他从来没有恼恨过你。
Where all else is lost, hate will see through.
Dāng yíqiè dōu yǐ xiāoshī，hèn què kěyǐ jiānchí dàodǐ。
当一切都已消失，恨却可以坚持到底。
小明非常忌恨上次打他的那个同学。
Xiǎo Míng fēicháng jìhèn shàngcì dǎ tā de nàge tóngxué。
Xiao Ming harbors great hate for the classmate who beat him last time.
怀恨在心
huáihèn zài xīn
nurse a hatred

It seems that he doesn’t mind, but in fact, he harbored a deep resentment.
怀恨
怀恨在心。
仇恨满怀。
to bear a grudge
怀恨在心，耿耿于怀
to have {or} bear a grudge (against sb)
对（某人）怀恨在心
to nurse a grudge against sb
对某人怀恨在心
She hated it whenever Spike got the jump on her.
Wúlùn héshí Sīpàikè qiǎng zài tā zhīqián， tā dōu huáihèn-zàixīn。
无论何时斯派克抢在她之前，她都怀恨在心。
to harbour a grudge against sb
对某人心怀怨恨
I still nurse anger and resentment from my childhood.
Wǒ Xīnzhōng yījiù huáiyǒu tóngnián shí jiù yǒude nùqì hé yuànhèn。
我心中依旧怀有童年时就有的怒气和怨恨。
附近的农户对匪徒之残毒恨之入骨。
Fùjìn de nónghù duì fěitú zhī cándú hènzhīrùgǔ。
The thugs\' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
他对贪官恨之入骨。
Tā duì tānguān hènzhīrùgǔ。
He detests corruption.
恨之入骨
恨之入骨。
to hate sb\'s guts
对某人恨之入骨
I hate his guts for cheating on me!
Yīnwèi qīpiàn wǒ， wǒ duì tā hènzhīrùgǔ。
因为欺骗我，我对他恨之入骨。
We all hate his guts for being the teacher\'s pet.
Yīn tā chéngwéi lǎoshī de xīnfù， wǒmen dōu duì tā hènzhīrùgǔ。
因他成为老师的心腹，我们都对他恨之入骨。
两人说得情投意合，只恨相见之晚。
Liǎng rén shuō de qíngtóuyìhé，zhǐ hèn xiāngjiàn zhī wǎn。
They found so much in common that they regretted not having met earlier.
两人谈得情投意合，相见恨晚。
Liǎngrén tán de qíngtóuyìhé，xiāngjiànhènwǎn。
The two found so much in common that they regretted not having met earlier.
这两个人彼此情投意合，相见恨晚。
Zhè liǎnggèrén bǐcǐ qíngtóu yìhé，xiāngjiàn hènwǎn。
The two of them have fallen in love with each other and regret that they did not meet earlier.
His resentment took the form of extreme hostility.
Tā de zēnghèn biǎoxiànwéi jíduān de díyì。
他的憎恨表现为极端的敌意。
Carl was a man with a chip on his shoulder. Everyone seemed in a conspiracy to slight or injure him.
卡尔整天带着一副愤恨不平的样子，好像大家都有意怠慢或伤害他。
He resented the meaninglessness of the tasks they assigned him.
Tā yuànhèn tāmen fēnpèigěi tā de rènwù méiyǒu shénme yìyì。
他怨恨他们分配给他的任务没有什么意义。
这个恶霸专门招惹良家女子，百姓们恨透了他。
Zhège èbà zhuānmén zhāorě liángjiā nǚzǐ，bǎixìngmen hèntòu le tā。
The local tyrant always gets a rise out of girls from decent families, and the common people hated him very much.
No vice is universally as hateful as ingratitude.
Shìshàng méiyǒu bǐ wàng\'ēn-fùyì gèng lìngrénzēnghèn de èxíng le。
世上没有比忘恩负义更令人憎恨的恶行了。

hèntòu

The local tyrant always gets a rise out of girls from decent families, and the common people hated him very much.

小说里浸透着作者的爱和恨。
做人不能太势利眼了，嫌贫爱富的人让人痛恨。
Zuò rén bùnéng tài shìlìyǎn le，xiánpín àifù de rén ràng rén tònghèn。
One shouldn\'t be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.
一听说儿子病了，她恨不得立刻飞到他身边。也说恨不能。
我恨不得立刻就去。
Wǒ hènbu de lìkè jiù qù。

我恨不得立刻就认识他。

恨不得亲手杀了这个罪犯才解恨。
The girl was hiding her face，pushing her hands up into her hair.
Zhège nǚhái bǎ shǒu jǔqǐ fàngjìn tóufa lǐ，hènbùde zhǎo gè dìfèng zuān jìnqù。
这个女孩把手举起放进头发里，恨不得找个地缝钻进去。
Sometimes she saw nurses whispering about her and wanted to hide.
Yǒushí tā kànjiàn hùshi zài qièqiè\'ěryǔ tánlùnzhe tā，jiù hènbùde zhǎo gè dìfang cáng qǐlái。
有时她看见护士在窃窃耳语谈论着她，就恨不得找个地方藏起来。
按捺不住心中的仇恨
ànnà búzhù xīnzhōng de chóuhèn 
be unable to suppress any longer the bitterness in one\'s heart
满腔仇恨
mǎnqiāngchóuhèn 
seething with hatred
她恨你就因为你说了那句话。
Tā hèn nǐ jiù yīnwèi nǐ shuō le nà jù huà。
She hates you for saying that.
我恨不得立刻就去。
Wǒ hènbu de lìkè jiù qù。
I wish I could go immediately.
我恨不得立刻就认识他。

huáihèn zài xīn
nurse a hatred
悔恨终身
huǐhèn zhōnɡshēn

她年轻不懂事，您别记恨她。
Tā niánqīngbùdǒngshì，nín bié jìhèn tā。
She is young and ignorant, so you shouldn\'t bear her any grudge.
这坏蛋打他一顿也不解恨。
Zhè huàidàn dǎ tā yídùn yě bùjiěhèn。
Thrashing this scoundrel wouldn\'t be enough to slake our hatred for him.
他这人真可恨，老在背后说别人的坏话。
Tā zhè rén zhēn kěhèn，lǎo zài bèihòu shuō biérén de huàihuà。
He\'s a most hateful person, always saying nasty things behind people\'s back.
刻骨仇恨
kègú chóuhèn
inveterate hatred; deep-seated hatred
愧恨交集
kuìhèn jiāojí
be overcome with shame and remorse
内心深自愧恨
nèixīn shēn zì kuìhèn
feel bitterly remorseful
他的批评是为你好，你可别恼恨他。
Tā de pīpíngshì wèi nǐ hǎo，nǐ kě bié nǎohèn tā。

qiāngǔ yíhèn
eternal regret

hèntòu 
be full of hatred for sb.; bitterly hate
久闻大名，但恨无缘拜识。
Jiǔwén dàmíng，dàn hèn wúyuán bàishí。
I have long been aware of your exalted name, and I regret never getting a chance to make your acquaintance.
世上决没有无缘无故的爱，也没有无缘无故的恨。
Shì shàngjué méiyǒu wúyuánwúgù de ài，yě méiyǒu wúyuánwúgù de hèn。
There is absolutely no such thing in the world as love or hate without cause or reason.
衔恨终生
xián hèn zhōnɡshēnɡ
nurse a deep grudge to the end of one\'s days

The two found so much in common that they regretted not having met earlier.

xīntóuhèn
rankling hatred
恨得直咬牙
hèn de zhí yǎoyá
gnash one\'s teeth in hatred
一朝失足，悔恨终生。
Yìzhāo shīzú，huǐhèn zhōng shēng。
A moment\'s error can bring a lifelong regret.
饮恨而终
yǐnhèn ér zhōng
die with a grievance in one\'s heart
仇恨郁积在心头
chóuhèn yùjī zài xīntóu 
hatred smouldering in one\'s bosom
他真是可恨至极。
Tā zhēn shì kěhèn zhìjí。
He is unbearably hateful.
两人志同道合，谈得投机，只恨相见之晚。
Liǎngrén zhìtóngdàohé，tán de tóujī，zhǐ hèn xiāngjiàn zhī wǎn。
Having the same interests, they had a most agreeable chat. They only regretted that they had not met sooner.
含恨
hánhèn
nurse a grievance or hatred
遗恨
yíhèn
eternal regret
衔恨
xiánhèn
harbour resentment; bear a grudge
饮恨
yǐnhèn
nurse a grievance
他衔恨而逝。
Tā xiánhèn ér shì．
他对这件事充满了懊恨。
Tā duì zhèjiànshì chōngmǎn le àohèn。
This thing fills him with regret.
他做出了一个让自己抱恨终生的决定。
Tā zuòchū le yígè ràng zìjǐ bàohèn zhōng shēng de juédìng。
He has made a decision that he is going to regret for the rest of his life.
他含恨抱冤却无处可诉。
Tā hánhèn bàoyuān què wúchù kěsù。
Though he feels strongly aggrieved, he has nowhere to complain to.
所有的别情离恨，在他看来只是生活中必然要经历的。
Suǒyǒu de biéqíng líhèn，zài tā kànlái zhǐ shì shēnghuó zhōng bìrán yào jīnglì de。
To him, all the farewell sentiments are something one has to endure in life.
附近的农户对匪徒之残毒恨之入骨。
Fùjìn de nónghù duì fěitú zhī cándú hènzhīrùgǔ。
The thugs\' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
他经常怅恨自己生不逢时。
Tā jīngcháng chànghèn zìjǐ shēngbùféngshí。
Born in unlucky times, he often feels depressed.
你必须除掉心头的仇恨，原谅别人就是原谅自己。
Nǐ bìxū chúdiào xīntóu de chóuhèn，yuánliàng biérén jiùshì yuánliàng zìjǐ。
You must release the hatred in your heart. To forgive others is to forgive yourself.
我恨不得明天就长大，这样可以工作，照顾家里。

I\'m dying to grow up, and work to feed my family.
没能上大学是他这一生的恨事。
Méi néng shàng dàxué shì tā zhè yìshēng de hènshì。
He considers it as his lifelong regret that he did not attend university.
他对她恚恨极了，不再有爱了。
Tā duì tā huìhèn jí le，búzài yǒu ài le。
His love for her has been replaced by deep hatred.
小明非常忌恨上次打他的那个同学。
Xiǎo Míng fēicháng jìhèn shàngcì dǎ tā de nàge tóngxué。
Xiao Ming harbors great hate for the classmate who beat him last time.
如果社会上人人都可以兼爱，那这个世界就不会再有恨了。

There would be no hatred if everyone gave universal love to each other.
群众声声詈骂也难解对这个贪官的心头之恨。
Qúnzhòng shēngshēng lìmà yě nán jiěduì zhège tānguān de xīntóu zhī hèn。
Curses are not enough to vent the anger of the masses towards corrupt officials.
这个恶霸专门招惹良家女子，百姓们恨透了他。
Zhège èbà zhuānmén zhāorě liángjiā nǚzǐ，bǎixìngmen hèntòu le tā。
The local tyrant always gets a rise out of girls from decent families, and the common people hated him very much.
我们的仇恨不共戴天，我与你势不两立。
Wǒmen de chóuhèn búgòng dàitiān，wǒ yǔ nǐ shìbùliǎnglì。
Our hatred for each other is absolutely irreconcilable. You and I are at daggers drawn.
他明面上说没往心里去，可实际上却怀恨在心。
Tā míngmiàn shàng shuō méi wǎng xīnlǐ qù，kě shíjìshàng què huáihèn zài xīn。
It seems that he doesn’t mind, but in fact, he harbored a deep resentment.
我崇敬的是光明磊落的人，痛恨的是势利小人。
Wǒ chóngjìng de shì guāngmínglěiluò de rén，tònghèn de shì shìlì xiǎorén。
The people I respect are straightforward ones; the ones I hate are snobs.
做人不能太势利眼了，嫌贫爱富的人让人痛恨。
Zuò rén bùnéng tài shìlìyǎn le，xiánpín àifù de rén ràng rén tònghèn。
One shouldn\'t be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.
搜括民脂民膏的赃官太可恨了！
Sōuguā mínzhī míngāo de zhāngguān tài kěhèn le！
The corrupt officials who exploit the masses are too hateful!
我最恨那些经常挑弄是非的小人了。
Wǒ zuì hèn nàxiē jīngcháng tiǎonòng shìfēi de xiǎorén le。
What I hate most are those who tell tales.
我最恨这种整天跳踉的人。
Wǒ zuì hèn zhèzhǒng zhěngtiān tiàoliàng de rén。
There are some people who are very arrogant but who aren\'t actually competent, and I personally most hate such people.
我真恨不得把这个卖国贼投畀豺虎。

The two of them have fallen in love with each other and regret that they did not meet earlier.
他尝试用各种各样的方法泄恨。
Tā chángshì yòng gèzhǒng gèyàng de fāngfǎ xièhèn。
He tried all means to let out his hatred.
新贵们痛恨改革。
Xīnguìmen tònghèn gǎigé。
The newly appointed high officials hate reforms.
他就是卖你妹妹的牙子，我们恨死他了。
Tā jiùshì mài nǐ mèimei de yázi，wǒmen hèn sǐ tā le。

他厌恨那个抛弃他的女人。
Tā yànhèn nàge pāoqì tā de nǚrén。
He detests the woman who abandoned him.
这种贪得无厌之类让人痛恨。
Zhèzhǒng tāndé wúyàn zhīlèi ràng rén tònghèn。

受到别人无端谤议，她却没有怨恨什么。
Shòudào biérén wúduān bàngyì，tā què méiyǒu yuànhèn shénme。
She didn\'t complain when facing other people\'s slander.
他恨遭人白眼。
Tā hèn zāorénbáiyǎn。
He hates being treated with disdain.
他恨懒惰的人。

She hates him and vice versa.
Tā tònghèn tā，tóngyàng tā yě tònghèn tā。
她痛恨他，同样他也痛恨她。
to bear a grudge
怀恨在心，耿耿于怀
Hate is the other of love.
恨是爱之对。
Remorse pricked his conscience.
悔恨使他的良心不安。
out of spite
出于怨恨
She was looking at me with a look of pure hate.
她充满怨恨地看着我。
In two years, their feelings tipped over from hate into love.
在两年的相处中，他们彼此的感情由恨变成了爱。
One moment she says she hates him, and the other she is completely in love.
她一会儿说恨他，一会儿又彻底爱上了他。
You have to bury your last love story, and all the hatred it left you, and go on with your life.
你必须忘记上一段感情以及它留给你的怨恨，然后继续你的生活。
He was full of hate in his eyes.
他的眼中充满了仇恨。
&quot;I hate you&quot; he said out of the blue.
他突然说：“我恨你”。
to be filled with anger/resentment
满腔怒火/憎恨
to have {or} bear a grudge (against sb)
对（某人）怀恨在心
to hate sb\'s guts
对某人恨之入骨
to harbour a grudge against sb
对某人心怀怨恨
He lost the case, but never held it against me.
他输了这场官司，但从未因此而记恨过我。
to have a horror of sth
痛恨某事
to nurse a grudge against sb
对某人怀恨在心
The whole school\'s going to hate you.
全体师生都会恨你的。
He hates us and everything we stand for.
他恨我们以及我们主张的一切。
I can\'t tell whether she loves me or she hates me.
我搞不清她是爱我还是恨我。

当悔恨的剧痛终于渐渐消失，接踵而来的反而是庆幸。
Carl was a man with a chip on his shoulder. Everyone seemed in a conspiracy to slight or injure him.
卡尔整天带着一副愤恨不平的样子，好像大家都有意怠慢或伤害他。
The film focused on base human emotions of greed and hatred.
Zhè bù diànyǐng guānzhù de shì rénlèi jīběn de tānlán hé zēnghèn qínggǎn。
这部电影关注的是人类基本的贪婪和憎恨情感。
The line between love and hate has blurred.
Ài yǔ hèn zhījiān de jièxiàn móhu le。
爱与恨之间的界限模糊了。
We are making an effort to crush hatred and intolerance.
Wǒmen zhèngzài nǔlì xiāochú chóuhèn hé piānzhí。
我们正在努力消除仇恨和偏执。
The gunman, now in police custody, is repentant.
Zhè míng chíqiāng dǎitú xiànzài yǐjīng bèi jǐngfāng jūliú，tā gǎndào hěn huǐhèn。
这名持枪歹徒现在已经被警方拘留，他感到很悔恨。
Marie felt herself caught up in the intensity of the old woman\'s hatred.
Mǎlì juéde zìjǐ xiànrùle lǎo fùrén de qiángliè chóuhèn zhīzhōng。
玛丽觉得自己陷入了老妇人的强烈仇恨之中。
She stared at him, aghast, and tears of remorse welled up.
Tā chījīng de zhùshìzhe tā，yǒngchū huǐhèn de lèishuǐ。
她吃惊地注视着他，涌出悔恨的泪水。
Her cousin\'s look had been full of spite to everyone.
Tā de biǎomèi kànlái yǐjīng yuànhèn suǒyǒu de rén。
他的表妹看来已经怨恨所有的人。
Their faces were full of hate.
Tāmen de liǎn shàng xiě mǎn le chóuhèn。
他们的脸上写满了仇恨。
Phoebe hated her for what she had done to her.
Fēibǐ wèi tā duì tā suǒ zuò de shìqing ér zēnghèn tā。
菲比为她对她所作的事情而憎恨她。

Wǒ Xīnzhōng yījiù huáiyǒu tóngnián shí jiù yǒude nùqì hé yuànhèn。

他们的怨恨爆发成了一场武装抗议。
She felt consumed with the most idiotic resentment.
Tā búduàn shòudào zuì yúchǔn yuànhèn de zhémó。
她不断受到最愚蠢怨恨的折磨。
He does well out of spite.
Tā déyì yú chóuhèn。
他得益于仇恨。
She hated it whenever Spike got the jump on her.
Wúlùn héshí Sīpàikè qiǎng zài tā zhīqián， tā dōu huáihèn-zàixīn。
无论何时斯派克抢在她之前，她都怀恨在心。
I hate his guts for cheating on me!

因为欺骗我，我对他恨之入骨。

The girl was hiding her face，pushing her hands up into her hair.

这个女孩把手举起放进头发里，恨不得找个地缝钻进去。

He has poisoned their minds with hatred.

如果你说一个反对他的字，他妻子就会永远恨你。

当一切都已消失，恨却可以坚持到底。

He hated her with all his heart.

Her tone was conversational although her eyes were smoldering.
Tā de yǔqì hǎoxiàng shì zài tánhuà，jǐnguǎn tā de yǎnjing shì fènhèn de。

He looked at her accusingly.

Remorse was cancerous within him.

He is justifiably bitter.

他的怨恨是有理由的。

从菜单中做出选择，之后按回车键。

huāngbùzélù，jībùzéshí

我们没有选择直接的路线，而将绕道风景更美的路线。
The store carried a large selection of shoes.
Shāngdiàn yǒu hěnduō xiézǐ kěgōng xuǎnzé。
商店有很多鞋子可供选择。
The preacher chose a text from psalms to introduce his sermon.
Mùshī xuǎnzéle shènggē zhōng de yì zhāng lái kāishǐ tā de bùdào
牧师选择了圣歌中的一章来开始他的布道
The selection was narrowed.
Xuǎnzé yúdì hěn xiǎo。
选择余地很小。

Měigēn xīnxiàn yǒu sān gēn dǎoxiàn chuānguò tā，tígōngle yòng yú xuǎnzé hé jiǎncè měi gè shùwèi de nèiróng de tújìng。
每根心线有三根导线穿过它，提供了用于选择和检测每个数位的内容的途径。

Shuí wèi zhè bù yōuměi de diànyǐng xuǎnzé de yǎnyuán？
谁为这部优美的电影选择的演员？
She selected a pair of shoes from among the dozen the salesgirl had shown her.
Tā zài nǚ shòuhuòyuán xiàng tā tuījiàn de shíjǐ shuāng xié zhōng xuǎnzéle yì shuāng。
她在女售货员向她推荐的十几双鞋中选择了一双。

Yàowù xuǎnzé shì tā de zhíyè。
药物选择是她的职业。

Wǒ yǒuguò hézhǒng xuǎnzé？

Wèihé zhèngkèmen zài bèi zhìyí yǒu wéifǎ xíngwéi shí zǒngshì biǎoxiànchū yǒu xuǎnzé de jiànwàngzhèng？
为何政客们在被质疑有违法行为时总是表现出有选择的健忘症？
Inventors seem to have chosen intuitively a combination of explosive and aggressive sounds as warning signals to be used on automobiles.
Fāmíngjiāmen hǎoxiàng shì píng zhíjué xuǎnzéle bàozhàshēng hé gōngjīshēng de hùnhéshēng lái zuòwéi qìchē de bàojǐngxìnhào。

只要有利可图，奸商就会不择手段去获取利润。

He\'ll go to any lengths to get rich.
不择手段。

我将不择手段把它拿回来。

别无选择
Biéwúxuǎnzé
have no choice
You have no choice, you have to take along your cat.
你别无选择，必须得带着你的猫。
to have no alternative (but to)
(除…外)别无选择
to have no other option (but to...)
(除…之外)别无选择
Changes are unsettling but sometimes imperative.
变动使人心烦，可是有时又别无选择。

He had no choice but to fight back the bully.
Chúle huánshǒu，duìfu huàidàn nǐ biéwúxuǎnzé。
除了还手，对付坏蛋你别无选择。

在那个时候，我别无选择，只能搬到一个更加便宜点的地方去。

zhǔ hánɡdào
the main channel

船航行在冰山之间时，水手小心地调整船帆。
Grave the ship before we start the new voyage.
在我们开始新航行之前清洗船底。
We should stay the mast in case it affects the voyage.
我们应该用支索撑住桅杆，以免影响航行。
Before we sail we have to consider the wind variable.
航行之前，我们得考虑风向的变化。
The junk could be seen sailing through the ocean waters.
Kěyǐ kàndào zhōngguó shì fānchuán zài dàyáng shàng hángxíng。
可以看到中国式帆船在大洋上航行。
The plan for the tack was set.
Z zìxíng hángxíng jìhuà yǐjīng quèdìng。
Z字形航行计划已经确定。
The tack was set for optimal speed.
Gùdìng hǎo lāfānshéng yǐ qǔdé zuì gāo hángxíng sùdù。
固定好拉帆绳以取得最高航行速度。
The large ship was easily tacked into the wind.
Nà sōu dàchuán qīngyì de diàotóu dǐngfēng hángxíng。
那艘大船轻易地调头顶风航行。
The transit across the ocean will take 2 weeks.
Yuè yáng hángxíng jiāng huā èr zhōu shíjiān。
越洋航行将花二周时间。
The ship changed navigation due to drift.
Yóuyú piānlíle hángdào，chuán gǎibiànle hángxíng fāngxiàng。
由于偏离了航道，船改变了航行方向。
The pirates appropriated the the trading ships that sailed in their seas.
Hǎidào jiéchíle zài qí dìpán shàng hángxíng de shāngchuán。
海盗劫持了在其地盘上航行的商船。
We are pleased to give you an audience, now tell us about your voyage.
Wǒmen fēichánggāoxìng zuò nǐ de tīngzhòng，xiànzài kuài bǎ nǐ de hángxíng jīnglì gàosu wǒmen。
我们非常高兴做你的听众，现在快把你的航行经历告诉我们。
They sailed across the seas and charted the coasts of the continents.
Tāmen zài hǎishàng hángxíng，huìzhì chū le lùdì hǎi\'ànxiàn de dìtú。
他们在海上航行，绘制出了陆地海岸线的地图。
They agreed to concede territory and navigation rights.
Tāmen tóngyì fàngqì lǐngtǔ hé hángxíngquán。
他们同意放弃领土和航行权。
It is a crank boat that sails as much as 45 degrees heeled.
Nà shì yì sōu qūzhóuchuán，kěyǐ sìshíwǔ dù qīngxié de jiǎodù hángxíng。
那是一艘曲轴船，可以45度倾斜的角度航行。
The ship could carry over I, 000 tons of coal to fuel her transatlantic voyages.
Chuán néng zhuāngzài yìqiān dūn méi wèi dàxīyáng hángxíng tígōng ránliào。
船能装载1000吨煤为大西洋航行提供燃料。
Navigation can often be awkward as you slip and slide your way across the river rapids.
Dāng nǐ huáxíngzhe chuānyuè hé zhōng jīliú shí，hángxíng xué jiù bùqǐ shénme zuòyòng le。
当你滑行着穿越河中激流时，航行学就不起什么作用了。
After a ten-minute delay we were cleared to resume our navigation along the north coast.
Zài dānge shí fēnzhōng hòu wǒmen huīfùle qiánwǎng běihǎi\'àn de hángxíng。
在耽搁十分钟后我们恢复了前往北海岸的航行。
Out at sea things can be a lot more volatile.
Hángxíng zhōng dōngxi kěnéng gèng bùróngyì wěndìng。
航行中东西可能更不容易稳定。
The seas are so strong that passage making in a southerly direction is impossible.
Hǎishàng fēnglàng hěn dà，xiàng nán hángxíng shì bù kěnéng de。
海上风浪很大，向南航行是不可能的。
The boat was pointing and leaning sharply along the water line.
Xiǎochuán yíngfēng hángxíng，chuántǐ yánzhe shuǐwèixiàn yánzhòng qīngxié。
小船迎风航行，船体沿着水位线严重倾斜。
The yacht was sailing flat against the wind.
Zhè sōu yóutǐng zhèngzài yíngfēng mǎnfān hángxíng。
这艘游艇正在迎风满帆航行。
We should crack on the sail, even in this bad weather.
Jíshǐ zài zhèyàng de huài tiānqì lǐ，wǒmen yě yīng yángfān hángxíng。
即使在这样的坏天气里，我们也应扬帆航行。
These were launched out over the Pacific，the first ones straight eastward over open sea.
Zhèxiē chuán hángxíng yuèguò Tàipíngyáng，zhè shì tāmen shǒucì bǐzhí xiàng dōng chuānyuè yuǎnhǎi。
这些船航行越过太平洋，这是它们首次笔直向东穿越远海。
They sailed south around the point.
Tāmen wéiràozhe yì diǎn xiàng nán hángxíng。
他们围绕着一点向南航行。
They developed alternative fuels for aircraft.
Tāmen kāifā le hángxíngqì de tìdàiránliào。
他们开发了航行器的替代燃料。
The ship made its run in record time.
Nà zhī chuán zài chuàng jìlù de shíjiān nèi wánchéngle qí chángguī hángxíng。
那只船在创纪录的时间内完成了其常规航行。
I love sailing，especially on the open sea.
Wǒ xǐhuan hánghǎi，yóuqíshì zàiwài Hǎishàng hángxíng。
我喜欢航海，尤其是在外海上航行。
They noted that it was a fine day to go sailing.
Tāmen rènwéi，zhè shì yí gè chūhǎi hángxíng de hǎotiānqì。
他们认为，这是一个出海航行的好天气。
We sailed the Atlantic.
Wǒmen zài Dàxīyáng shàng hángxíng。
我们在大西洋上航行。
He sailed the Pacific all alone.
Tā dúzì zài Tàipíngyáng shàng hángxíng。
他独自在太平洋上航行。
The old salt had sailed the seven seas.
Zhè wèi jīngyàn fēngfù de shuǐshǒu hángxíngguò shìjiè qī dàyáng。
这位经验丰富的水手航行过世界七大洋。
We began to steer away westerly.
Wǒmen kāishǐ xiàng xī hángxíng。
我们开始向西航行。
The ship travelled unswervingly through the night.
Chuán zài yèsè zhōng zhàozhí xiàng qián hángxíng。
船在夜色中照直向前航行。
We saved money by bareboating.
Wǒmen tōngguò kōngchuán hángxíng jiéyuēle huāfèi。
我们通过空船航行节约了花费。
They were sailing windward.
Tāmen zhèng yíngfēng hángxíng。
他们正迎风航行。
They were sailing leeward.
Tāmen zhèng shùnfēng hángxíng。
他们正顺风航行。
Nasa reported a trouble-free launch.
（Měiguó） guójiā hángkōng hé yǔzhòu hángxíngjú bàoduì yí cì chénggōng fāshè jìnxíngle bàodǎo。
（美国）国家航空和宇宙航行局报对一次成功发射进行了报导。
Ships ply the waters near the coast.
Chuánzhī zài kàojìn Hǎi\'àn de shuǐyù wǎngfǎn hángxíng。
船只在靠近海岸的水域往返航行。
They outsailed the roman fleet.
Tāmen bǐ Luómǎ chuánduì hángxíng de kuài。
他们比罗马船队航行得快。
They rode the trade winds going west.
Tāmen shùnzhe màoyìfēng xiàng xī hángxíng。
他们顺着贸易风向西航行。
On international flights, baggage is usually limited to 20kg.
国际航班的行李限重通常为20公斤。
Air travel involves too much waiting in airports.
Hángkōng lǚxíng guòchéng xūyào zài jīchǎng huā dàliàng shíjiān hòujī。
航空旅行过程需要在机场花大量时间候机。
The boat tacked.
Zhè sōu chuán gǎibiàn hángxiàng，yíngfēng xíngshǐ。
这艘船改变航向，迎风行驶。
to fly in formation
[航空 ] 编队飞行
She was happier being the wife of an airline pilot.
Zuò hángkōng gōngsī fēixíngyuán de lǎopo，tā gǎndào gèng xìngfú le。
做航空公司飞行员的老婆，她感到更幸福了。
In 1987, the British Government introduced legislation which imposes fines on airlines without valid documents.
1987 nián，Yīngguó Zhèngfǔ tuīchūle yí gè fǎ\'àn，duì méiyǒu yǒuxiào zhèngjiàn de hángkōng gōngsī jìnxíng fákuǎn。
1987年，英国政府推出了一个法案，对没有有效证件的航空公司进行罚款。
blind flying
【航空学】盲目飞行
Budget airlines pilots cut corners.
低票价航空公司的飞行员喜欢抄近路。
to fly blind
【航空学】盲目地飞行
She was sick during the cruise, she spent almost the whole trip at the head.
她在航游途中病了，几乎整个行程都在不停地上厕所。
The accident was described in captain\'s log.
船长的航海日志对这起事故进行了描述。
Once when I was flying home the pilot had to crab the plane.

曾经有一次，当我乘飞机回家的时候，飞行员不得不让飞机偏航以绕开龙卷风。
The canal was to be closed and emptied for repairs.
Gāi hángdào jiāng bèi fēngbì、 páikōng，yǐbiàn jìnxíng xiūlǐ。
该航道将被封闭、排空，以便进行修理。
The astronauts walked in outer space without a tether.
Yǔhángyuán zài méiyǒu xì shéng de qíngkuàng xià jìnxíng tàikōng xíngzǒu。
宇航员在没有系绳的情况下进行太空行走。
That airline company has a good safety record.
那家航空公司保持着很好的安全飞行记录。
The pilot radioed that his navigation systems had failed.
Fēixíngyuán tōngguò wúxiàndiàn bàogào tā de dǎoháng xìtǒng chūle gùzhàng。
飞行员通过无线电报告他的导航系统出了故障。
Airlines are cutting cross-country fares next holidays.
航空公司将在接下来的几个假期对国内机票实行打折活动。
拨正航向
bōzhèng hángxiàng 
correct the course
改变航向
ɡǎibiàn hánɡxiànɡ
change course; tack
右航向
yòu hánɡxiànɡ
starboard tack
左航向
zuǒ hánɡxiànɡ
port tack
误差航向
wùchā háng xiàng
course error
航向指示器
hánɡxiànɡ zhǐshìqì
direction (or heading) indicator
宇宙飞船载着宇航员们向月球进发。
Yǔzhòu fēichuán zǎi zhe yǔhángyuánmen xiàng yuèqiú jìnfā。
The spacecraft with its astronauts goes to the moon.
我们航行的方向出现偏差，请右满舵行驶。
Wǒmen hángxíng de fāngxiàng chūxiàn piānchā，qǐng yòu mǎnduò xíngshǐ。
We deviated in our navigation. Please turn right full rudder.
他的一番话给我点燃了航标灯，使我有了奋斗的方向。
Tā de yì fān huà gěi wǒ diǎnrán le hángbiāodēng，shǐ wǒ yǒu le fèndòu de fāng xiàng。
Like a beacon, his words inspired me.
海上航行时掌舵手要懂得把握风向，见风使舵。
Hǎi shàng hángxíng shí zhǎngduòshǒu yào dǒngdé bǎwò fēng xiàng，jiànfēng shǐduò。
The steered should be able to judge the direction of wind and trim the sails to it.
航向
拨正航向，全速前进。
航向不明
测定船位，修正航向

to be blown off course
[ship+] 被吹得偏离了航向
The high winds forced the sailboat to sail a tack.

The sailors decided to tack their direction due to the storm.

由于遇到了暴风雨，水手决定临时调整他们的航向。

When the ship was caught in a storm,they could not handle sails or rudders.

当船遇上风暴时，他们无法处理好航向或者舵。
The boat beat about in the wind.
Chuán zài fēngtóu gǎibiàn hángxiàng。

The ship was put about during the storm.

在风暴期间，这艘船改变了航向。

这艘船改变航向，迎风行驶。
The ship changed navigation due to drift.

由于偏离了航道，船改变了航行方向。

他们向东航行。

航线已经测定。

kāipì hángxiàn

Tóngshí，Měiguó guójiā hángkōng yǔ Hángtiānjú bàogào fāxiànle yí gè yǐnqíng gùzhàng，zhè kěnéng huì dǎozhì hángtiān fēijī fāshè jìhuà gēqiǎn。
同时，美国国家航空与航天局报告发现了一个引擎故障，这可能会导致航天飞机发射计划搁浅。
他报考了航空公司的导航员。
Tā bàokǎo le hángkōng gōngsī de dǎohángyuán。
He has registered to take an examination to be a  navigator of the aviation company.
这个航空公司首度放飞欧洲航线。
Zhège hángkōng gōngsī shǒudù fàngfēi Ōuzhōu hángxiàn。
The airline company launched a European route for the first time.
这家航空公司目前正在用波音747取代DC10。
Zhèjiā hángkōng gōngsī mùqián zhèngzài yòng bōyīn qīsìqī qǔdài DC shí。
The airline is currently replacing its DC10s with Boeing747s.
他在这家航空公司担任乘务工作。
Tā zài zhè jiā hángkōng gōngsī dānrèn chéngwù gōngzuò。
He works as a steward in this airline company.

内阁决定把这三家英国航空公司收归国有。
She was happier being the wife of an airline pilot.
Zuò hángkōng gōngsī fēixíngyuán de lǎopo，tā gǎndào gèng xìngfú le。
做航空公司飞行员的老婆，她感到更幸福了。
The airline blamed the maintenance people for the crash.
Hángkōng gōngsī jiāng zhuìjī shìgù guījiù yú wéixiū rényuán。
航空公司将坠机事故归咎于维修人员。
Today 90% of America\'s domestic passenger traffic is carried by the eight largest airlines.

目前美国的八大航空公司承担着国内90%的旅客运输。

United Airlines is under new pressure to agree to a buyout proposal.

Thanks to low cost airlines, it is easy to travel aroud the world.

Wǒmen tōngguò kōngchuán hángxíng jiéyuēle huāfèi。
我们通过空船航行节约了花费。
The boat is kept at an even speed during the trip.
这艘船在航行中匀速行驶。
The device can navigate the ship automatically without artificial intervention.
这个仪器不需要人工操作就可以自动为船导航。
The tack of the vessel was being adjusted.
Zhèngzài tiáozhěng lúnchuán de hángxiàng。
正在调整轮船的航向。
The pirates appropriated the the trading ships that sailed in their seas.

海盗劫持了在其地盘上航行的商船。

The ship got under way.
Chuán qǐháng le。
船启航了。
The ship yawed when the huge waves hit it.

受巨浪袭击，这艘船偏航了。
They outsailed the roman fleet.

船长的航海日志对这起事故进行了描述。
The astronaut walked out of his ship and onto the moon\'s surface.

宇航员走出飞船踏上了月球表面。
The boat tacked.
Zhè sōu chuán gǎibiàn hángxiàng，yíngfēng xíngshǐ。

Grave the ship before we start the new voyage.
在我们开始新航行之前清洗船底。

强风迫使帆船转变了航向。
We were all aboard and ready to set sail.

The boat deviated 5 degrees from the actual course.

该船与实际航线偏离了五度。

The junk could be seen sailing through the ocean waters.

The ship then edged away from the river.

The large ship was easily tacked into the wind.

那艘大船轻易地调头顶风航行。

所有进出港口的船只都应当使用主航道及通路。

It is a crank boat that sails as much as 45 degrees heeled.

那是一艘曲轴船，可以45度倾斜的角度航行。

The vessel encountered bad weather and had to change the route.
这艘船遇到了坏天气，不得不改变航线。
Ships ply the waters near the coast.

船只在靠近海岸的水域往返航行。
When the ship was caught in a storm,they could not handle sails or rudders.

当船遇上风暴时，他们无法处理好航向或者舵。
The ship made its run in record time.

kāihánɡrì
sailing day
开辟航线
kāipì hángxiàn
open an air or sea route
坚冰已经打破，航道已经开通。
Jiān bīng yǐjing dǎpò，hángdào yǐjing kāitōng。
The ice has been broken and the river route is open.
他立志要当一名宇航员。
Tā lìzhì yào dāngyì míngyǔhángyuán。
He is determined to become an astronaut.
航海罗经
hánghǎi luójīng
mariner\'s compass
内河航行权
nèihé hángxíngquán
inland navigation rights
航空配餐
hángkōngpèicān 
airline meal
船偏离了航线。
Chuán piānlí le hángxiàn。
The ship drifted off its course.
这艘货轮什么时候启航？
Zhè sōu huòlún shénme shíhou qǐháng?
When does the freighter set sail?
潜航深度
qiánhángshēndù
submerged depth
潜航速度
qiánhángsùdù
submerged speed
这家航空公司目前正在用波音747取代DC10。
Zhèjiā hángkōng gōngsī mùqián zhèngzài yòng bōyīn qīsìqī qǔdài DC shí。
The airline is currently replacing its DC10s with Boeing747s.
航海日志
hánghǎi rìzhì
logbook; log
航空摄影
hángkōngshèyǐng
aerial photography
这种新型战斗机的巡航速度为声速的二倍。
Zhèzhǒng xīn xíng zhàndǒujī de xúnháng sùdù wéi shēngsù de èrbèi。
The cruising speed of this new type of fighter is twice the speed of sound (or is Mach two).
首次航行
shǒucì hángxíng
maiden (or first) voyage
建港一年来，共为506艘次进行导航。
Jiàn gǎng yìnián lái，gòng wèi wǔbǎilíngliù sōucì jìnxíng dǎoháng。
Since the port opened one year ago, it has provided navigation services 506 vessel-times.
航海天文学
hánɡhǎi tiānwénxué 
nautical astronomy
班机因气候恶劣停航。
Bānjī yīn qìhou èliè tíngháng。
The regular flight is suspended on account of bad weather.
通航水域
tōnghángshuǐyù 
navigable waters
北京与拉萨之间已通航了。
Běijīng yǔ Lāsà zhījiān yǐ tōngháng le。
There is now air service between Beijing and Lhasa.
航空线路
hángkōngxiànlù
air route
行星际航行
xíngxīngjì hángxíng
interplanetary flight (or travel)
巡航半径
xúnhánɡ bànjìnɡ
cruising radius
巡航速度
xúnhángsùdù
cruising speed
沿着海岸航行
yán zhe hǎi\'àn hángxíng
sail along the coast
航空邮件
hángkōngyóujiàn 
air mail
航道淤塞。
Hángdào yūsè。
The waterway is silted up.
整治航道
zhěnɡzhì hánɡdào 
dredge waterways
上海和纽约之间有直航。
Shànghǎi hé Niǔyuē zhījiān yǒu zhíháng。
There are non-stop flights between Shanghai and New York.
航运滞塞。
Hángyùn zhìsāi。
The river traffic is held up.
民航
mínháng
他在这家航空公司担任乘务工作。
Tā zài zhè jiā hángkōng gōngsī dānrèn chéngwù gōngzuò。
He works as a steward in this airline company.
这是这艘船的处女航，工作人员既紧张又兴奋。
Zhè shì zhè sōu chuán de chǔnǚháng，gōngzuò rényuán jì jǐnzhāng yòu xīngfèn。
This is this ship\'s virgin voyage, so the crew is very excited.
风大时，船户一般不会出航。
Fēng dà shí，chuánhù yìbān búhuì chūháng。
When there is a strong wind, the boatmen do not go sailing under ordinary circumstances.
我们的船在导标的指引下航行。
Wǒmen de chuán zài dǎobiāo de zhǐyǐn xià hángxíng。
The beacons guided our sailing.
由于年年干旱，这条河流已经断航了。
Yóuyú niánnián gànhàn，zhè tiáo héliú yǐjing duànháng le。
Years of droughts have caused the suspension of shipping on this river.
船刚航行到江心，舵盘忽然失灵了。
Chuán gāng hángxíng dào jiāngxīn，duòpán hūrán shīlíng le。
The steering wheel failed to work properly when the ship was in the middle of the river.
航空公司为这次飞递救命骨髓而特开了绿色通道。
Hángkōng gōngsī wèi zhècì fēidì jiùmìng gǔsuǐ ér tè kāi le lǜsè tōngdào。
The airline company opened an emergency green path for the delivery of the lifesaving bone-marrow.
受到大雾影响而停飞的班机已全部复航。
Shòudào dàwù yǐngxiǎng ér tíngfēi de bānjī yǐ quánbùfùháng。
Airplanes grounded because of the fog have already taken off.
由于航班延误，原定明天一早的会议需改定时间。
Yóuyú hángbān yánwù，yuándìng míngtiān yìzǎo de huìyì xū gǎidìng shíjiān。
Due the flight delay, the meeting next morning needs to be rescheduled.
据传观音菩萨的前身是道教的慈航道人。
Jùchuán guānyīn púsà de qiánshēn shì dàojiào de Cíháng dàorén。
According to legend, the predecessor of Guanyin was a Taoist priest named Cihang.
这就是哥伦布发现新大陆航行的海道。
Zhè jiùshì Gēlúnbùfāxiàn xīn dàlù hángxíng de hǎidào。
This sea route is the way Columbus sailed when he discovered the new continent.
今日海况良好，适合出航。
Jīnrì hǎikuàng liánghǎo，shìhé chūháng。
Today the sea is serene, and is fit for a voyage.
他的一番话给我点燃了航标灯，使我有了奋斗的方向。
Tā de yì fān huà gěi wǒ diǎnrán le hángbiāodēng，shǐ wǒ yǒu le fèndòu de fāng xiàng。
Like a beacon, his words inspired me.
这位摄影师从事航空摄影已经30多年了。
Zhèwèi shèyǐngshī cóngshì hángkōng shèyǐng yǐjing sānshí duōnián le。
The cameraman has been engaged in aerophotography for more than thirty years.
航空信可以很快到达目的地。
Hángkōngxìn kěyǐ hěnkuài dàodá mùdìdì。
Airmail can arrive at the destination very quickly.
这条航路是新开发的。
Zhè tiáo hánglù shì xīn kāifā de。
This air route is newly developed.
航拍的照片很清晰，能够清楚地看到地球表面的情况。
Hángpāi de zhàopiàn hěnqīngxī，nénggòu qīngchu de kàndào dìqiú biǎomiàn de qíngkuàng。
Photos of aero photograph are very clear, and the surface of the Earth can be seen clearly.
他从小的梦想就是进航校，当飞行员。
Tā cóng xiǎo de mèngxiǎng jiùshì jìn hángxiào，dāng fēixíngyuán。
He has been dreaming of entering aviation school, and becoming a pilot since he was very young.
这两天有什么航讯，给我说说。
Zhè liǎngtiān yǒu shénme hángxùn，gěi wǒ shuōshuō。
Tell me some recent news about navigation.
在轮船上，我们可以通过航讯了解国内外大事。
Zài lúnchuán shàng，wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò hángxùn liǎojiě guónèiwài dàshì。
On steamboat, we can get news from home and abroad via radio signal.
他是这艘护航舰的总指挥，权利很大。
Tā shì zhè sōu hùhángjiàn de zǒngzhǐhuī，quánlì hěndà。
He is the commander in chief of this escort ,and he holds great power.
航空母舰不小心挤垮了一艘小渔船，幸亏没造成人员伤亡。
Hángkōngmǔjiàn bùxiǎoxīn jǐkuǎ le yì sōu xiǎo yúchuán，xìngkuī méi zàochéng rényuán shāngwáng。
The aircraft carrier accidentally hit a little fishing boat. Luckily, no one was hurt.
海上航行时掌舵手要懂得把握风向，见风使舵。
Hǎi shàng hángxíng shí zhǎngduòshǒu yào dǒngdé bǎwò fēng xiàng，jiànfēng shǐduò。
The steered should be able to judge the direction of wind and trim the sails to it.
本次航班经济舱的机票已全部售完。
Běncì hángbān jīngjìcāng de jīpiào yǐ quánbùshòuwán。
The economy class tickets for this flight are already sold out.
春节期间，铁路、公路、航空的客运量全都暴增。
Chūnjié qījiān，tiělù、gōnglù、hángkōng de kèyùnliàng quándōu bàozēng。
During Spring Festival, passenger transport volume for railways, highways and airways increases rapidly.
出海远航到第10天时，船上的淡水就匮竭了。
Chūhǎi yuǎnháng dào dìshítiān shí，chuánshàng de dànshuǐ jiù kuìjié le。
On the tenth day of the voyage, the vessel\'s fresh water was exhausted.
这个养殖场准备引进几百只来航鸡。
Zhège yǎngzhíchǎng zhǔnbèi yǐnjìn jǐ bǎi zhī láihángjī。
This aquatic breeding farm is going to introduce hundreds of Leghornos.
这项技术在航天史上是零的突破。
Zhè xiàng jìshù zài hángtiānshǐ shàng shì líng de tūpò。
This technology is a first in aerospace history.
我们航行的方向出现偏差，请右满舵行驶。
Wǒmen hángxíng de fāngxiàng chūxiàn piānchā，qǐng yòu mǎnduò xíngshǐ。
We deviated in our navigation. Please turn right full rudder.
当他们开始新的远航时，我们鸣炮欢送了他们。
Dāng tāmen kāishǐ xīn de yuǎnháng shí，wǒmen míngpào huānsòng le tāmen。
Before they took a long voyage, we fired firecrackers to see them off.
由于天气原因，机场的某些航班停运了。
Yóuyú tiānqì yuányīn，jīchǎng de mǒuxiē hángbān tíngyùn le。
Some scheduled flights are decommissioned due to bad weather.
航天飞机已经进入下一个气层了。
Hángtiān fēijī yǐjing jìnrù xià yígè qìcéng le。
The space shuttle has already entered the next atmospheric layer.
航天器太空舱内所使用的设备均是由特殊材料制成的。
Hángtiānqì tàikōngcāng nèi suǒ shǐyòng de shèbèi jūn shì yóu tèshū cáiliào zhìchéng de。
The equipment in the capsule is made of special materials.
请在航空母舰的甲板上停机。
Qǐng zài hángkōng mǔjiàn de jiǎbǎn shàng tíngjī。
Please stop flights on the deck of the aircraft carrier.
由于导航系统出现了故障，船舶停驶在公海上了。
Yóuyú dǎoháng xìtǒng chūxiàn le gùzhàng，chuánbó tíngshǐ zài gōnghǎi shàng le。
Due to problems with the navigation system, the ship was forced to stop on the high seas.
国家经过选留，培养了一批宇航员。
Guójiā jīngguò xuǎnliú，péiyǎng le yì pī yǔhángyuán。
Through selection, the state has retained and trained a group of astronauts.
我国致力于开发巡航导弹，加强国防建设。
Wǒ guó zhìlìyú kāifā xúnháng dǎodàn，jiāqiáng guófáng jiànshè。
Our country is devoted to the development of cruise missiles to strengthen its national defense.
研造航空母舰的计划被大家通过了。
Yánzào hángkōng mǔjiàn de jìhuà bèi dàjiā tōngguò le。
The plan for the development of an aircraft carrier has been approved by everyone.
近年来长江里含大量泥沙，造成航道淤浅。
Jìnniánlái Cháng Jiāng lǐ hán dàliàng níshā，zàochéng hángdào yūqiǎn。
Recently, there has been much mud in the Yangzi River, which makes the channel much shallower than before.
宇航器的出现为我们探索太空提供了可能。
Yǔhángqì de chūxiàn wèi wǒmen tànsuǒ tàikōng tígōng le kěnéng。
The shape of a spaceship makes it possible for us to explore outerspace.
所有宇航员都必须经过严格的体能训练。
Suǒyǒu yǔhángyuán dōu bìxū jīngguò yángé de tǐnéng xùnliàn。
All astronauts must go through strict physical training.
宇宙飞船载着宇航员们向月球进发。
Yǔzhòu fēichuán zǎi zhe yǔhángyuánmen xiàng yuèqiú jìnfā。
The spacecraft with its astronauts goes to the moon.
暴风雨使货船偏离了主航道。
Bàofēngyǔ shǐ huòchuán piānlí le zhǔhángdào。
The storm has driven the cargo ship off of its main course.
我哥哥是海军航空兵，驾驶先进的战斗机。
Wǒ gēge shì hǎijūn hángkōngbīng，jiàshǐ xiānjìn de zhàndòujī。
My brother pilots an advanced battle plane in Naval Air Force.
新落成的航空港有着最先进的设施和最完备的服务。
Xīn luòchéng de hángkōnggǎng yǒu zhe zuì xiānjìn de shèshī hé zuì wánbèi de fúwù。
The newly-built airport has the most advanced facilities, and provides perfect service.
航空母舰的战斗力相当大，是一个国家海军军事力量的象征。
Hángkōng mǔjiàn de zhàndòulì xiāngdāng dà，shì yígè guójiā hǎijūn jūnshì lìliang de xiàng zhēng。
With high combat effectiveness, the aircraft carrier is emblematic of the navy\'s military might.
飞机是我们最常见的航空器。
Fēijī shì wǒmen zuì chángjiàn de hángkōngqì。
Aircrafts are the most common aerial crafts.
船队经过七天七夜的航行，终于抵达印度洋。
Chuánduì jīngguò qītiān qīyè de hángxíng，zhōngyú dǐdá Yìndùyáng。
After sailing for seven days and seven nights, the fleet finally arrived at the Indian Ocean.
稀有金属是航空工业发展不可或缺的原材料。
Xīyǒujīnshǔ shì hángkōng gōngyè fāzhǎn bùkěhuòquē de yuáncáiliào。
Rare metal is indispensable for the aircraft industry.

We should consult a chart of the area to find a good place for sailing.

在那种心境下，我搭乘了意大利航空公司的这次航班来到罗马。
You must take an indirect course in sailing.

I love sailing，especially on the open sea.

我还没有来得及问他名字，他就把电话挂了。
Wǒ hái méiyǒu lái dejí wèn tā míngzì，tā jiù bǎ diànhuà guà le。
He hung up (or rang off) before I could ask his name.
你先别挂，等我查一下。
Nǐ xiān bié guà，děngwǒ chá yíxià。

我呆会儿再给他挂电话。
Wǒ dāihuìr zài gěi tā guà diànhuà。
I\'ll ring him up again.

Bǎ tuōchē guàshàng。

Tā de yīfu gěi dīngzi guàzhù le。

shíkè bǎ qúnzhòng de lìyì guà zài xīnshàng

Tā liǎn shàngguà le yì céngchéntǔ。

Wǒ yào guà wàikē。

yí guà dàchē

shí duō guà biānpào

yí guà zhūzi

guà gāosùdǎng

guà tóudǎng

你挂的是几号？

Tā tuǐ shàngguàguò liǎngcì huā。

guàniàn qīnrén

Wǒ shēntǐ hěn hǎo，qǐngwù guàniàn。

ɡuàzhànɡ tínɡxī

他这人就是小心眼，针鼻儿大的事能挂累好长时间。

他不想挂累别人，独自把事情承担下来。

He doesn\'t want to involve anyone else and takes on the whole thing all by himself.
人家都挂镰了，咱这还有这么多没割。

They have already finished their work, but we still have so much left.
一个人校对这么多版面，有些挂漏是难免的。

当妈妈的总是挂牵着自己孩子的冷暖饥饱。

这笔帐你已经挂欠一年了，也该还上了。

It is time to pay the debt that you have owed for one year.
挂羊头卖狗肉是那些奸商常用的伎俩。
Guà yángtóu mài gǒuròu shì nàxiē jiānshāng chángyòng de jìliǎng。
Palming off goods inferior to what they purport to be is a common trick of unscrupulous merchants.
我家的合家欢就挂在里屋的墙上。
Wǒjiā de héjiāhuān jiù guàzài lǐwū de qiáng shàng。

A huge streamer is hung below the eaves of the Hall of Supreme Harmony in the Imperial Palace.
雨后，美丽的彩虹横空悬挂。
Yǔhòu，měilì de cǎihóng héngkōng xuánguà。
A beautiful rainbow hangs in the sky after the rain.
过节时各家窗户上都挂了红灯，显得喜气洋洋的。
Guòjié shí gè jiā chuānghu shàng dōu guà le hóngdēng，xiǎnde xǐqì yángyáng de。
On festivals, every family hangs red lanterns on their windows and it appears very festive.
节日的街头挂满了红通通的灯笼。
Jiérì de jiētóu guàmǎn le hóngtōngtōng de dēnglóng。
On the festival, the whole street is hanging red lanterns.
挂在他家墙上的喉管是他爷爷留下来的民间乐器。
Guàzài tā jiā qiáng shàng de hóuguǎn shì tā yéye liúxiàlái de mínjiān yuèqì。
The reed pipe hanging on the wall of his home is a folk musical instrument left by his grandpa.
我喜欢他挂在墙上的这幅花鸟画。
Wǒ xǐhuan tā guà zài qiáng shàng de zhèfú huāniǎohuà。
I like the flower-bird painting hanging on his wall.
太阳挂在天上像个大火球。
Tàiyáng guàzài tiānshàng xiàng gè dàhuǒqiú。
The sun looks like a huge fire ball in the sky.
一轮皎白的圆月挂在天上。
Yì lún jiǎobái de yuányuè guàzài tiānshàng。
In the sky the moon shines brightly.
一把大刀金煌煌地挂在墙上。
Yì bǎ dàdāo jīnhuánghuáng de guàzài qiáng shàng。
A shiny broadsword is hanging on the wall.
他的胸前挂满了金闪闪的奖章。
Tā de xiōngqián guàmǎn le jīnshǎnshǎn de jiǎngzhāng。
He wears a number of shiny medals on his chest.
老先生的精舍中挂着不少名人字画。
Lǎoxiānshēng de jīngshě zhōng guà zhe bùshǎo míngrén zìhuà。
There are many paintings and calligraphy works in the old gentleman\'s study.
这座酒楼酒望高挂，生意兴隆。
Zhèzuò jiǔlóu jiǔwàng gāoguà，shēngyì xīnglóng。
The wine sign overhangs the prosperous restaurant.

Tīngshuō yúxíng zhuāngshìwù kěyǐ jùcái，tā jiù zài zìjǐ de diàn lǐ guà le yígè jíxiángyú。

房间里静静的，只有那个老挂钟在咔哒咔哒地走着。
Fángjiān lǐ jìngjìng de，zhǐyǒu nàge lǎoguà zhōng zài kādā kādā de zǒu zhe。
The room is so quiet, with just one old clock ticking.
把这张照片扩放成12寸吧，可以挂在卧室的墙上！
Bǎ zhèzhāng zhàopiàn kuòfàngchéng shí\'èrcùn ba，kěyǐ guà zài wòshì de qiángshàng！
Let\'s enlarge the photo to 12 inches, then it can be hung on the bedroom wall.
我在外工作十分牵挂家中的老母。
Wǒ zài wài gōngzuò shífēn qiānguà jiā zhōng de lǎomǔ。
Working outside, I miss my mother very much.
自从他走后，妻子总是离情绵绵地记挂着他。
Zìcóng tā zǒu hòu，qīzǐ zǒngshì líqíng miánmián de jìguà zhe tā。
Since he left, his wife missed him with endless parting feelings.
连串儿的彩灯挂满了房间，打开电源便五颜六色的。
Liánchuànr de cǎidēng guàmǎn le fángjiān，dǎkāi diànyuán biàn wǔyán liùsè de。

He must have felt a loss of face since you scolded him like this.
我把洗净的衣服挂在露台上晾干。
Wǒ bǎ xǐjìng de yīfu guàzài lòutái shàng liànggān。
I hang washed clothes on the flat roof to dry.

He hangs the picture of Holy Mary in the room.

He puts on his armor and goes into action again today, many years after he said goodbye to the world of sports.

zài fǎnháng tú zhōng

途中
tú zhōng 
on the way; en route

Zài jiānyā tú zhōng fànrén táopǎo le，zhèshì yājiè rényuán de shīzhí。

Tā bù néng kāihuì shí zhōngtú líchǎng。
她不能开会时中途离场。
I don\'t like to be interrupted in the middle of a lecture.
Yǎnjiǎng shí， wǒ bù xǐhuan bèi zhōngtú dǎduàn。
演讲时，我不喜欢被中途打断。
Imagine meeting you halfway around the world! It\'s a small world!
Xiǎngxiàng zài huányóu shìjiè zhōngtú hé nǐ xiāngyù！Zhège shìjiè kě zhēn xiǎo a！
想象在环游世界中途和你相遇！这个世界可真小啊！

Wǒmen zhōngtú zài Fēnlán tíngliú。
我们中途在芬兰停留。

在去城里的途中

这女孩在比赛途中摔倒了。

她在航游途中病了，几乎整个行程都在不停地上厕所。

[person+] 在旅途中

one set of equipment serving many purposes

半途拆伙
bàntú chāihuǒ 
part company halfway
改革必须坚持到底，不能半途而废。
Gǎigé bìxū jiānchídàodǐ，bùnéng bàntú\'érfèi。
Reforms must be carried through to the end and not abandoned halfway.
你做事要有长性，不能总是半途而废。
Nǐ zuòshì yào yǒu chángxìng，bùnéng zǒngshì bàntúérfèi。
You should have some perseverance. Don\'t give up halfway.
做事情总是半途而废是她性格中的致命伤。
Zuòshìqing zǒngshì bàntúérfèi shì tā xìnggé zhōng de zhìmìngshāng。
The fatal weakness in her character is that she always gives up halfway.
我们一定要坚持到底，不能半途而废。
Wǒmen yídìngyào jiānchídàodǐ，bùnéng bàntú\'érfèi。
We must persevere – we can\'t give up halfway.

The conference today lasted for half a day, many people slipped away before it finished.
半途而废
半途而废

要么坚持到底，要么半途而废，我选择前者。

不要半途而废，继续你的计划。

Tā láizì yí gè cóngbú bàntú\'érfèi de jiātíng。
他来自一个从不半途而废的家庭。
Doing something by halves，is to do something partially or incompletely.
Zuòshì bàntú\'érfèi，jiùshì zuò mǒu jiàn shì zhǐ zuò yí bùfēn，bú zuòwán。
做事半途而废，就是做某件事只做一部分，不做完。
He did only a half job.
Tā bàntú\'érfèi。
他半途而废。
This measure crippled our efforts.
Zhè xiàng cuòshī shǐ wǒmen de nǔlì bàntú\'érfèi。
这项措施使我们的努力半途而废。

Wǒ zài yí xiàng bàntú\'érfèi de rènwù shàng làngfèile yì nián shíjiān。
我在一项半途而废的任务上浪费了一年时间。
New research from Boston University finds that 86 percent of adults carry a store loyalty card and use it, even though cards give stores the right to track consumer purchases.
波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。
一时某些商品少了些，人们就忙着争购。
Yìshí mǒu xiē shāngpǐn shǎo le xiē，rénmen jiù máng zhe zhēnggòu。
When there is a shortage, people will snap up goods.
由于市场竞争十分激烈，大部分小公司被收购。
Yóuyú shìchǎngjìngzhēng shífēn jīliè，dàbùfèn xiǎo gōngsī bèi shōugòu。
As the market is very competitive, the majority of small companies have been taken over.
对于购买火车票是否要搞实名制，目前还有争议。
Duìyú gòumǎi huǒchēpiào shìfǒu yào gǎo shímíngzhì，mùqián háiyǒu zhēngyì。
It is still debatable whether one should leave one\'s real name and show one\'s identification when buying train tickets.

预购合同
yùgòu hétong
forward purchasing contract

yóuɡòubù

网上购物便于人们进行价格比较。
Many goods are bought online sight unseen.

许多商品未被检查就被从网上购买。
Don\'t plan on help from the company website if you do not buy from them directly.

收购价格
shōugòu jiàgé

This year\'s purchasing of peanuts has started.

波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。

Háiyǒu yí gè wèntí jiùshì shì shēzhàng háishì zhīfù xiànjīn gòumǎi。
还有一个问题就是是赊账还是支付现金购买。
They purchased TV time with eight 20 second slots.
Tāmen gòumǎile bā gè èrshí miǎozhōng shícháng de diànshì shíduàn kòngdàng。
他们购买了8个20秒钟时长的电视时段空档。
Purchasing from the cheapest source can save a country substantial sums.
Cóng zuì piányi de qúdào gòumǎi nénggòu jiéshěng guójiā yì bǐ hěn kěguān de fèiyòng。
从最便宜的渠道购买能够节省国家一笔很可观的费用。
What is the single most important factor when buying a stock for investment purposes?
Zài yǐ tóuzī wéi mùdì gòumǎi gǔpiào shí，xūyào kǎolǜ de zuì zhìguānzhòngyào de yīnsù shì shénme？
在以投资为目的购买股票时，需要考虑的最至关重要的因素是什么？
Most contracts are likely to include only a broad specification of the service being purchased.
Dàbùfèn hétong kěnéng zhǐ bāokuò yào gòumǎi fúwù de dàzhì shuōmíng。
大部分合同可能只包括要购买服务的大致说明。
Following their divorce, the wife now wanted to buy and run a small hotel.
Zài tāmen líhūn hòu，qīzǐ xiànzài xiǎng yào gòumǎi hé jīngyíng yì jiā xiǎoxíng jiǔdiàn。
在他们离婚后，妻子现在想要购买和经营一家小型酒店。
The price of the book may preclude its private purchase, but it would be a useful addition to any library.

这本书的价格或许会令个人放弃购买，但它对任何一家图书馆而言都是有用的补充。
Victory can be purchased at too great a price.
Shènglì yào fùchū hěn gāo\'áng de dàijià cáinéng gòumǎi dào。
胜利要付出很高昂的代价才能购买到。
The purchase of specialist equipment may be uneconomic or insufficiently flexible.

购买专家设备可能是浪费或者不够灵活。

Zǒng\'éryánzhī，zhè chē shì zhídé gòumǎi de。
总而言之，这车是值得购买的。

Employers held real wage growth close to zero for the whole decade.

在过去十年中，雇员的工资上涨的实际购买力接近为零。

购置书籍、纸张、文具等
gòuzhì shūjí、zhǐzhāng、wénjùděng
buy books, stationery and so on
收购价格
shōugòu jiàgé
purchasing (or procurement) price
今天去购物，一不小心又挨宰了！
Jīntiān qù gòuwù，yíbùxiǎoxīn yòu áizǎi le！
I got overcharged again today when I was shopping!
采购员小李去上海办货，今天就能回公司。
Cǎigòuyuán Xiǎo Lǐ qù Shànghǎi bànhuò，jīntiān jiùnéng huí gōngsī。
Buyer Xiao Li went to Shanghai to purchase goods and can return to the company today.
各大银行都有国债承购包销的业务。
Gè dà yínháng dōu yǒu guózhài chénggòu bāoxiāo de yèwù。
All banks underwrite national debt.
“五一”期间液晶电视大降价，引发消费者持币待购。
“Wǔyī”qījiān yèjīng diànshì dàjiàngjià，yǐnfā xiāofèizhě chíbì dàigòu。
LCD TVs were on sale during the May Day holiday, which made consumers wait to buy with cash in hand.
上周开会，我和主任决定筹购几台空调。
Shàngzhōu kāihuì，wǒ hé zhǔrèn juédìng chóugòu jǐ tái kōngtiáo。
The director and I decided during last week\'s meeting that we should buy some air conditioners.
节日期间，购卖此书者搭头送毛绒玩具。
Jiérì qījiān，gòu mài cǐ shū zhě dā tóu sòng máoróng wánjù。
During the festival, soft toys will be given to those who buy the book.
在这次采购中，我买到了很多低价商品。
Zài zhècì cǎigòu zhōng，wǒ mǎidào le hěnduō dījià shāngpǐn。
I bought many things at low prices during this shopping trip.
导购员介绍说，这些玩具适合低幼儿童。
Dǎogòuyuán jièshào shuō，zhèxiē wánjù shìhé dīyòu értóng。
The shop girl said that these toys were fit for young children.
电购生活用品，快捷方便。
Diàngòu shēnghuó yòngpǐn，kuàijié fāngbiàn。
It is convenient to buy daily necessities by telephone.
她喜欢购买和收藏漂亮的耳饰。
Tā xǐhuan gòumǎi hé shōucáng piàoliang de ěrshì。
She is fond of buying and collecting beautiful ear ornaments.
每户村民都顺利购买到了返销粮。
Měi hù cūnmín dōu shùnlì gòumǎi dào le fǎnxiāo liáng。
All the villagers bought the state-purchased grain successfully.
他的纱厂需要购买一批新的纺锭。
Tā de shāchǎng xūyào gòumǎi yì pī xīn de fǎngdìng。
He needs to purchase a patch of new spindles for his cotton mill.
购买这种饮料可以获取一定分值，以后可以兑换奖品。
Gòumǎi zhèzhǒng yǐnliào kěyǐ huòqǔ yídìng fēnzhí，yǐhòu kěyǐ duìhuàn jiǎngpǐn。
You can get certain bonus points by buying this kind of drink, which can be exchanged for gifts in the future.
他在理财顾问的建议下，购买了一些封闭性基金。
Tā zài lǐcái gùwèn de jiànyì xià，gòumǎi le yìxiē fēngbìxìng jījīn。
He bought some close-ended funds at the advice of his financial consultant.
我要用这月工资购买公债券。
Wǒ yào yòng zhè yuè gōngzī gòumǎi gōngzhàiquàn。
I will spend my salary of this month buying government bonds.
供销社在收购农民的余粮。
Gōngxiāoshè zài shōugòu nóngmín de yúliáng。
The supply and marketing cooperative is purchasing farmers\' surplus grains.
购得的股票全都赔了，他很着急。
Gòudé de gǔpiào quándōu péi le，tā hěnzháojí。
He is very worried after having lost all the money he spent buying stocks.
这些东西的购价很便宜，你也买点儿吧。
Zhèxiē dōngxi de gòujià hěnpiányi，nǐ yě mǎi diǎnr ba。
The purchase price of these things is quite low, I suggest that you buy some too.
他今天去购物了，满载而归。
Tā jīntiān qù gòuwù le，mǎnzǎi ér guī。
He went shopping today and returned fully loaded.
市民们踊跃购买国债券，因为它比一般存款的利息高。
Shìmínmen yǒngyuè gòumǎi guózhàiquàn，yīnwèi tā bǐ yìbān cúnkuǎn de lìxī gāo。
Citizens enthisiastically buy government bonds, because they have higher interest rates than ordinary deposits.
最近公司购进了很多办公耗材。
Zuìjìn gōngsī gòujìn le hěnduō bàngōng hàocái。
Recently the company bought many office appliances.
他购买了许多灰膏准备新建房屋。
Tā gòumǎi le xǔduō huīgāo zhǔnbèi xīnjiàn fángwū。
She bought a lot of white lime, preparing to build a new house.
她出嫁后不久就购买礼物准备回门。
Tā chūjià hòu bùjiǔ jiù gòumǎi lǐwù zhǔnbèi huímén.
Shortly after her marriage, she and her husband purchased gifts and prepared to return to her hometown.
现在人们购买笔记本电脑并不是简单的以文字和数据处理为主要功能，而是趋向应用集成化。
Xiànzài rénmen gòumǎi bǐjìběn diànnǎo bìng búshì jiǎndān de yǐ wénzì hé shùjù chǔlǐ wéi zhǔyào gōngnéng，érshì qū xiàng yìngyòng jíchénghuà。
Nowadays, people are not buying laptops to simply process words and digits, but to make an integrated use of all its functions.
医院把高价收购到的养蚕户家中的僵蚕做成药材。
Yīyuàn bǎ gāojià shōugòu dào de yǎngcánhù jiā zhōng de jiāngcán zuòchéng yàocái。
The hospital buys silkworms at a high price, from which they can make medicine.
网上购物可以用银行卡交款。
Wǎngshàng gòuwù kěyǐ yòng yínhángkǎ jiāokuǎn。
While shopping online, you can pay with your bank card.
公安局最近购买了一批警械。
Gōngānjú zuìjìn gòumǎi le yì pī jǐngxiè。
The police bureau just bought some truncheons.
春节快到了，大家在竞购年货。
Chūnjié kuàidào le，dàjiā zài jìnggòu niánhuò。
People vie with each other in making special purchases for Spring Festival.
今年的花生收购工作已经开秤。
Jīnnián de huāshēng shōugòu gōngzuò yǐjing kāichèng。
This year\'s purchasing of peanuts has started.
我们厂想添购两个空气锤。
Wǒmen chǎng xiǎng tiāngòu liǎnggè kōngqìchuí。
Our company wants to buy two more air hammers.
国家的这种控购行为可以调节市场不平衡的状态。
Guójiā de zhèzhǒng kònggòu xíngwéi kěyǐ tiáojié shìchǎng bùpínghéng de zhuàngtài。
The country can adjust the unbalanced market by controlling purchases.
为了激活市场购买力，两家公司决定降价联销部分库存商品。
Wèile jīhuó shìchǎng gòumǎilì，liǎng jiā gōngsī juédìng jiàngjià liánxiāo bùfēn kùcún shāngpǐn。
In order to activate market purchasing power, the two companies decided to lower the price to jointly sell some of the stock goods.
公司董事会正在密议这次并购事宜。
Gōngsī dǒngshìhuì zhèngzài mìyì zhècì bìnggòu shìyí。
The directors of the company are  secretly discussing matters concerning the merger and acquisition.
每到年根，大家就要忙着采购年货了。
Měidào niángēn，dàjiā jiùyào máng zhe cǎigòu niánhuò le。
At the end of each year, people are busy doing Spring Festival shopping.
村里直接从农机具制造厂购进了一些锄头。
Cūn lǐ zhíjiē cóng nóngjījù zhìzàochǎng gòujìn le yìxiē chútou。
The village purchased some hoes directly from the farming implement plant.
平籴是一种利国利民的粮食收购制度。
Píngdí shì yìzhǒng lìguó lìmín de liángshí shōugòu zhìdù。
Selling the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years is a grain purchase system which is good both for the country and its people.
结婚前他们为将来的生活添购了许多器用。
Jiéhūn qián tāmen wèi jiānglái de shēnghuó tiāngòu le xǔduō qìyòng。
They bought many utensils for their future life before the wedding.
我准备去商场采购一些日用品。
Wǒ zhǔnbèi qù shāngchǎng cǎigòu yìxiē rìyòngpǐn。
I plan to go to the supermarket to buy some daily necessities.
我上半天打算去商场购物。
Wǒ shàngbàntiān dǎsuan qù shāngchǎng gòuwù。
I am going to go shopping in the bazaar in the morning.
我申购了工商银行发行的新股。
Wǒ shēngòu le gōngshāng yínxíng fāxíng de xīngǔ。
I applied to buy the new shares issued by the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China.
对于购买火车票是否要搞实名制，目前还有争议。
Duìyú gòumǎi huǒchēpiào shìfǒu yào gǎo shímíngzhì，mùqián háiyǒu zhēngyì。
It is still debatable whether one should leave one\'s real name and show one\'s identification when buying train tickets.
美观、便宜、实用性是我选购商品的三大原则。
Měiguān、piányí、shíyòngxìng shì wǒ xuǎngòu shāngpǐn de sān dà yuánzé。
Beauty, cheapness and practicality are my three principles when buying things.
过年以前我到食品街采购了许多吃食、年货。
Guònián yǐqián wǒ dào shípǐnjiē cǎigòu le xǔduō chīshí、niánhuò。
Before the new year, I bought a lot of foodstuffs and special commodities for the Spring Festival in Food Street.
家住市中心虽然购物很方便，但是交通很拥挤。
Jiā zhù shì zhōng xīn suīrán gòuwù hěnfāngbiàn，dànshì jiāotōng hěnyōngjǐ。
It is convenient to live downtown, but the traffic is very heavy.
剧场门外的水牌上刚写出梅兰芳的演出预告，票就被抢购一空了。
Jùchǎng ménwài de shuǐpái shàng gāng xiěchū Méi Lánfāng de yǎnchū yùgào，piào jiù bèi qiǎnggòuyìkōng le。
The moment the announcement of Mei Lanfang\'s performance was written on the billboard outside the theater, tickets sold out in a rush.
昂贵的房价使很多购房者不得不缩衣节食。
Ángguì de fángjià shǐ hěnduō gòufángzhě bùdébù suōyījiéshí。
The sky-high price of houses forced many buyers to stint on food and clothes.
如果购买套票参观博物馆，就可以省很多钱。
Rúguǒ gòumǎi tàopiào cānguān bówùguǎn，jiù kěyǐ shěng hěnduō qián。
Buying sets of tickets to the museum can save you a lot of money.
他太高了，只能购买特体服装穿了。
Tā tài gāo le，zhǐnéng gòumǎi tètǐ fúzhuāng chuān le。
He is very tall, so he has to buy specially designed clothes.
这种特殊物资是由国家统购的。
Zhèzhǒng tèshū wùzī shì yóu guójiā tǒnggòu de。
These special goods are purchased by state monopoly.
这所学校购买了一批新进的投影仪。
Zhè suǒ xuéxiào gòumǎi le yì pī xīnjìn de tóuyǐngyí。
This school has bought a new batch of projectors.
我想购买投资基金，却不知道该选择哪一支。
Wǒ xiǎng gòumǎi tóuzī jījīn，què bùzhīdào gāi xuǎnzé nǎ yì zhī。
I want to buy some capital funds, but don\'t know which one to choose.
经过整整十年，小王才把购房尾款全部付清。
Jīngguò zhěngzhěng shí nián，xiǎo Wáng cái bǎ gòufáng wěikuǎn quánbùfùqīng。
After ten whole years, Xiao Wang paid off all the remaining mortgage.
这家日本工厂总是购买下脚料来进行生产。
Zhèjiā Rìběn gōngchǎng zǒngshì gòumǎi xiàjiǎoliào lái jìnxíng shēngchǎn。
This Japanese factory always buy\'s leftover bits, and pieces to produce its products.
他购买了一本《新著小学生行为规范》。
Tā gòumǎi le yì běn《Xīnzhù xiǎoxuésheng xíngwéi guīfàn》。
He bought a copy of New Behavioral Norms for Primary Students.
我们的用房情况很紧张，单位却无钱购房。
Wǒmen de yòngfáng qíngkuàng hěn jǐnzhāng，dānwèi què wúqián gòufáng。
Our work place is quite crowded, but the unit has no money to buy new houses.
国家对征购粮有优惠政策。
Guójiā duì zhēnggòuliáng yǒu yōuhuì zhèngcè。
The State has some preferential policies for grain purchased by the state.
我们去香港旅游，正值香港购物节。
Wǒmen qù Xiānggǎng lǚyóu，zhèngzhí xiānggǎng gòuwùjié。
When we traveled in Hong Kong, it happened to be shopping season.
最近，掀起了中小型汽车购买热。
Zuìjìn，xiānqǐ le zhōng xiǎoxíng qìchē gòumǎirè。
Recently, there has been a craze for medium-sized and small-sized cars.
大型购物场所都拥有中央空调。
Dàxíng gòuwù chǎngsuǒ dōu yōngyǒu zhōng yāng kōngtiáo。
All the big shopping centers have central air conditioning.
医药采购的主渠道是通过医院对药品进行招投标。
Yīyào cǎigòu de zhǔqúdào shì tōngguò yīyuàn duì yàopǐn jìnxíng zhāo tóubiāo。
The main channel for purchaing medicines is through medicine auctions held by hospitals.
听说棕榈油可以减肥，广大 肥胖女士疯狂抢购。
Tīngshuō zōnglǘyóu kěyǐ jiǎnféi，guǎngdà féipàng nǚshì fēngkuáng qiǎnggòu。
It was said palm oil can help weight loss, so many obese women rushed crazily to buy it.
包装箱别乱扔，还是卖到废品收购站吧。
Bāozhuāngxiāng bié luànrēng，háishì màidào fèipǐn shōugòuzhàn ba。
Don\'t throw away the packing boxes. It\'s better to sell them to the recycling station.
国家保护价粮食收购政策有效保障了农民的利益。
Guójiā bǎohùjià liángshí shōugòu zhèngcè yǒuxiào bǎozhàng le nóngmín de lìyì。
The state policy of purchasing grain at a protected price has effectively secured the interests of farmers.
我们需要再购买些广告色制作展板。
Wǒmen xūyào zài gòumǎi xiē guǎnggàosè zhìzuò zhǎnbǎn。
We need to purchase more poster colors for making exhibition boards.
他们档案室因为需要控制绝对湿度，所以购买了一台专用设备。
Tāmen dàngànshì yīnwèi xūyào kòngzhì juéduì shīdù，suǒyǐ gòumǎi le yìtái zhuānyòng shèbèi。
In order to control the absolute humidity, they bought a piece of special equipment for the archives office.
我在商场购买了一个落地灯。
Wǒ zài shāngchǎng gòumǎile yígè luòdìdēng。
I bought a floor lamp in the store.
他去火车站购买了一张往返票。
Tā qù huǒchēzhàn gòumǎile yìzhāng wǎngfǎnpiào。
He went to buy a round-trip ticket in the train station.
周末，她不是购物，就是看电视。
Zhōumò，tā búshì gòuwù，jiùshì kàndiànshì。
If she doesn\'t go shopping at the weekend she\'ll watch TV.
我当时有种购物的冲动。
Wǒ dāngshí yǒuzhǒng gòuwùde chōngdòng。
I had an impulse to go shopping.

dǎogòuxiǎojiě

她爱购物。
Tā ài gòuwù。
She likes shopping.

Wǒ gāngcái qùgòuwù le。

学校又购置了一批计算机。
xuéxiào yòu gòuzhìle yìpī jìsuànjī。
The school has purchased another batch of computers.
我们将成批购进材料。
Wǒmen jiāng chéngpī gòujìn cáiliào.
We are going to buy the materials wholesale.
减价商品能凭礼券购买。
Jiǎnjià shāngpǐn néng píng lǐquàn gòumǎi.
Cut-price products can be paid for with gift vouchers.
赊购
shēgòu
buy on credit
购房时一定要深思熟虑。
Gòufáng shí yídìng yào shēnsīshúlǜ。
When buying a house you must give it careful consideration.
她的最大嗜好是购物。
Tā de zuìdà shìhào shì gòuwù。
Her favourite (英) {或} favorite (美) hobby is shopping.
由于市场竞争十分激烈，大部分小公司被收购。
Yóuyú shìchǎngjìngzhēng shífēn jīliè，dàbùfèn xiǎo gōngsī bèi shōugòu。
As the market is very competitive, the majority of small companies have been taken over.
购物付款可以刷卡。
Gòuwù fùkuǎn kěyǐ shuākǎ。
Goods can be paid for by card.

They could find no record of the purchase.
Tāmen kěnéng fāxiàn méiyǒu cǎigòu jìlù。
他们可能发现没有采购记录。
We go marketing every Saturday.
Wǒmen měi zhōu liù dōu qù cǎigòu。
我们每周六都去采购。
She buys for the big department store.
Tā wèi nà jiā dàxíng Bǎihuògōngsī bànlǐ cǎigòu yèwù。
她为那家大型百货公司办理采购业务。
He was responsible for the procurement of materials and supplies.
Tā fùzé yuáncáiliào hé gōngyìngshāng cǎigòu。
他负责原材料和供应商采购。
They were busily engaged in buying souvenirs.
Tāmen zài fēicháng fánmáng de cǎigòu jìniànpǐn。
他们在非常繁忙地采购纪念品。
Shrewd purchasing requires considerable knowledge.
Jīngmíng de cǎigòu xūyào dàliàng zhīshi。
精明的采购需要大量知识。
Buying and selling fill their days.
Tāmen tiāntiān máng de jiùshì cǎigòu hé xiāoshòu。
他们天天忙的就是采购和销售。
China also released its official PMI figures on Thursday.
zhōusì，Zhōngguó hái fābùle guānfāng cǎigòu jīnglǐ zhǐshù (PMI)。
周四，中国还发布了官方采购经理指数(PMI)。
公司董事会正在密议这次并购事宜。
Gōngsī dǒngshìhuì zhèngzài mìyì zhècì bìnggòu shìyí。
The directors of the company are  secretly discussing matters concerning the merger and acquisition.
现在人们购买笔记本电脑并不是简单的以文字和数据处理为主要功能，而是趋向应用集成化。
Xiànzài rénmen gòumǎi bǐjìběn diànnǎo bìng búshì jiǎndān de yǐ wénzì hé shùjù chǔlǐ wéi zhǔyào gōngnéng，érshì qū xiàng yìngyòng jíchénghuà。
Nowadays, people are not buying laptops to simply process words and digits, but to make an integrated use of all its functions.
听说纺织集团要购并我们厂。
The merger ended up being a terrible waste of money.
这次并购到头来只是一场巨大的浪费而已。
The CEO said that the merger discussions had been completed in just three weeks.
Shǒuxí zhíxíngguān shuō gōngsī bìnggòu tánpàn yǐ zài sān zhōu nèi wánchéng。
首席执行官说公司并购谈判已在三周内完成。
My company has adjusted its reports in conjunction with the merger.
Wǒmen de gōngsī yǐjīng ànzhào zhècì bìnggòu jiāoyì biàngēngle jiāoyì bàogào。
我们的公司已经按照这次并购交易变更了交易报告。
Analysts predict a wave of acquisitions and mergers over the next few years.
Fēnxījiā yùcè，wèilái jǐnián zhōng jiānghuì fāshēng yícì bìnggòu fēngcháo。
分析家预测，未来几年中将会发生一次并购风潮。
The company has not profited from the merger.
Zhège Gōngsī háiméiyǒu cóng bìnggòu zhōng huòlì。
这个公司还没有从并购中获利。
The farmers may be selling or buying sheep and cattle, and buying fencing, feedstuffs or machinery.
Nónghùmen huòxǔ zhèngzài xiāoshòu huò gòumǎi yáng、 niú，bìng zhèngzài gòumǎi wéilán cáiliào、 sìliào huò jīqì。
农户们或许正在销售或购买羊、牛，并正在购买围栏材料、饲料或机器。
The industry has consolidated in recent years through mergers and acquisitions.
这个行业在近几年通过合并和收购变强了。

现货市场中，应用现金购买商品并且要立即送货。

公司将会介入并监督为校区采购电脑的全过程。
Please buy the following items and bring them to class.
Qǐng gòumǎi yǐxià wùpǐn，bìng bǎ tāmen dàidào bānshàng lái。

公司可以购买自己已发行的普通股或有限股，并将其取消以收回股票。
New research from Boston University finds that 86 percent of adults carry a store loyalty card and use it, even though cards give stores the right to track consumer purchases.
波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。
《阅微草堂笔记》
《Yuèwēicǎotáng Bǐjì》 
Jottings from the Thatched Abode of Close Observations

月偏食
yuèpiānshí
partial lunar eclipse
日(月)偏食时，有三个食相：初亏、食甚、复圆。
Rì（yuè）piān shí shí，yǒu sāngè shíxiāng：chūkūi、shíshèn、fùyuán。
A partial solar (lunar) eclipse goes through three phases: the first contact, the maximum phase, and the last contact.
月亮遮住太阳会形成日偏食。
Yuèliàng zhēzhù tàiyáng huì xíngchéng rìpiānshí。
When the moon shuts out the sun, a partial solar eclipse appears.

rìpiānshí

Tā duì xiǎo érzi yǒudiǎnr piānxīn。
She makes rather a favourite of her youngest son.
偏心凸轮
piānxīn tū lún
eccentric cam
我看爷爷对弟弟是有偏心眼儿的。
Wǒ kàn yéye duì dìdi shì yǒu piānxīnyǎnr de。
I believe that grandpa is partial to my younger brother.
偏心轮行程
piānxīnlún xíngchéng
throw of eccentric

我跟他非亲非故，跟你也无冤无仇，我不偏向哪个，只说几句良心话。
Wǒ gēn tā fēiqīnfēigù，gēn nǐ yě wúyuānwúchóu，wǒ bùpiān xiàng nǎgè，zhǐ shuō jǐ jù liángxīnhuà。
He\'s not my relative, and you are not my enemy. I don\'t favour either one of you. I only want to say a few honest words.
你偏偏要说他上次出丑的事，这不是有心犯讳吗？

jiūzhèngpiān xiàng
correct a deviation

我们航行的方向出现偏差，请右满舵行驶。

一发生矛盾你就不问原因不论是非地向着自己的老乡，这不是拉偏手吗？！

这道题不仅太难，甚或太偏，我们都不会做。

日偏食
rìpiānshí
partial solar eclipse
月偏食
yuèpiānshí
partial lunar eclipse
日(月)偏食时，有三个食相：初亏、食甚、复圆。
Rì（yuè）piān shí shí，yǒu sāngè shíxiāng：chūkūi、shíshèn、fùyuán。
A partial solar (lunar) eclipse goes through three phases: the first contact, the maximum phase, and the last contact.
月亮遮住太阳会形成日偏食。
Yuèliàng zhēzhù tàiyáng huì xíngchéng rìpiānshí。
When the moon shuts out the sun, a partial solar eclipse appears.

偏科现象
piānkē xiànxiànɡ
tendency to focus on a few subjects
据科学发现：地球磁场极正在发生缓慢的偏移。
Jù kēxué fāxiàn：dìqiú cíchǎngjí zhèngzài fāshēng huǎnmàn de piānyí。
Scientific discoveries say that the earth\'s pole is drifting off slowly course.
中学生不应偏科。
他见解偏狭，视角片面，写出的文章自然不深刻。
Tā jiànjiě piānxiá，shìjiǎo piànmiàn，xiěchū de wénzhāng zìrán bùshēnkè。
His views are biased and he has only one viewpoint, so naturally, his article is not profound.
他住在村子偏东南的一角
in odd corners
在偏僻的角落
这几个偏将都是主帅的得力部下。
Zhè jǐgè piānjiàng dōushì zhǔshuài de délì bùxià。
These subordinate generals are the chief commander\'s right hands.
你怎么偏偏喜欢将家丑外扬呢？
Nǐ zěnme piānpiān xǐhuan jiāng jiāchǒu wàiyáng ne？
Why are you fond of publicizing the skeletons in the family closet?
偏将
I will battle against prejudice and ignorance forever.
我将终生为消灭偏见和无知而战。
Blake will probably transfer most of the property to his favorite son Tom.
布莱克很可能会将他的大部分财产转给他最偏爱的儿子汤姆。
根深蒂固的偏见
gēnshēndìgù de piānjiàn
deep-rooted (or inveterate) prejudice
我对他没有偏见。
Wǒ duì tā méiyǒu piānjiàn。
I\'ve no prejudice against him.
偏见
piānjiàn
prejudice
你对他有偏见。
Nǐ duì tā yǒu piānjiàn.
You\'re prejudiced against him.
这是我的一偏之见，你爱听不听。
Zhè shì wǒ de yìpiān zhī jiàn，nǐ ài tīng bùtīng。
This is my one-side view, you can listen to it or not.
意见偏激
yìjiàn piānjī
hold extreme views
作为领导一定要懂得兼听则明，偏信则暗的道理，多听意见，不可偏信。
Zuòwéi lǐngdǎo yídìng yào dǒngdé jiāntīng zémíng，piānxìn zéàn de dàolǐ，duōtīng yìjiàn，bùkě piānxìn。
Leaders should follow the rule of listening to both sides and never be partial toward either side.
我不想见他，偏撞上他了。
Wǒ bùxiǎngjiàn tā，piān zhuàngshàngtā le。
I tried to avoid him, but it was just my luck to bump into him.
他见解偏狭，视角片面，写出的文章自然不深刻。
Tā jiànjiě piānxiá，shìjiǎo piànmiàn，xiěchū de wénzhāng zìrán bùshēnkè。
His views are biased and he has only one viewpoint, so naturally, his article is not profound.
偏见。
存有偏见
偏见比无知距离真理更远。
一偏之见。
prejudice against/in favour of sb
对某人有偏见/偏爱某人
Ignorance breeds prejudice.
无知产生偏见。
Prejudice colored his views.
他的观点带有偏见的色彩。
remarks colored by prejudice
因偏见而歪曲了事实的话
deep-rooted bias
根深蒂固的偏见
a knee-jerk bigot
可预知的抱偏见的人
a prejudice against modern art
对现代艺术有偏见
strong prejudice
根深蒂固的偏见
to win free from bias and prejudice
摆脱偏见
winding his prejudices through all his writings
他通过自己的全部作品巧妙地反映了他的偏见
I\'m against any kind of prejudice, aren\'t you?
我反对任何形式的偏见，你呢？
I will battle against prejudice and ignorance forever.
我将终生为消灭偏见和无知而战。
It seems your deep rooted prejudice has completely colored your judgment.
看来你根深蒂固的偏见已经完全影响了你的判断力。
Most nations of the globe have some sort of color prejudice.
世界上多数国家多少都有些种族偏见。
to be bias(s)ed against
对…有偏见
to prejudice sb against/in favour of sth
使某人对某事抱有偏见/怀有好感
to be prejudiced against sb/sth
对某人/某事存有偏见
Remember to keep an open mind to controversial views.
谨记要对异议不存偏见。
His words prejudice his children against the poor people.
他的话使他的孩子对穷人抱有偏见。
The reporter\'s angle on the story was obvious and angered the man she was interviewing.
Zhège jìzhě duìyú gāi shìjiàn de bàodào xiǎnrán cúnzài piānjiàn，zhè yě rěnùle shòufǎngzhě。
这个记者对于该事件的报道显然存在偏见，这也惹怒了受访者。
American conservatives often complain about what they see as the liberal bias of the media.
Měiguó bǎoshǒupài jīngcháng bàoyuàn tāmen suǒ kàndào de shì méitǐ de zìyóuzhǔyì piānjiàn。
美国保守派经常抱怨他们所看到的是媒体的自由主义偏见。
Stop biasing the people before the vote.
Zài tóupiào zhīqián，búyào duì xuǎnmín yǒu piānjiàn。
在投票之前，不要对选民有偏见。
His answers were designed to bias the jury.
Tā de dá\'àn mùdì shì ràng péishěntuán chǎnshēng piānjiàn。
他的答案目的是让陪审团产生偏见。
I will not let personal prejudices interfere with my judgement.
Wǒ búhuì ràng gèrén piānjiàn gānrǎo wǒ de pànduàn。
我不会让个人偏见干扰我的判断。
For the last time, I\'m not prejudiced about women working.
Wǒ zuìhòu shuō yí cì，wǒ duì fùnǚ cānjiā gōngzuò bú bào piānjiàn。
我最后说一次，我对妇女参加工作不抱偏见。
Some people react so strongly against television news, alleging antagonistic bias.
Yǒuxiē rén duì diànshì xīnwén fǎnyìng hěn qiángliè，biǎoshì chū duìkàngxìng de piānjiàn。
有些人对电视新闻反应很强烈，表示出对抗性的偏见。
He had a bias against education.
Tā duì jiàoyù yǒu piānjiàn。
他对教育有偏见。
It smoothed down the prejudices which many had conceived against him.
Zhè píngxīle xǔduō rén céngjīng duì tā huáiyǒu de piānjiàn。
这平息了许多人曾经对他怀有的偏见。
The witness is biased and so cannot be trusted.
Zhèngrén yǒu piānjiàn，suǒyǐ bù néng xiāngxìn。
证人有偏见，所以不能相信。
They had to wait a generation for that prejudice to fade.
Tāmen bìxū děngdài hěn jiǔ cáinéng kàndào piānjiàn de xiāoshī。
他们必须等待很久才能看到偏见的消失。
We must combat the prejudices against other races.
Wǒmen bìxū hé mínzú piānjiàn zuò dòuzhēng。
我们必须和民族偏见做斗争。
Keep in mind the dangers of imposing our own values and prejudices too forcibly.
Yào láojì bǎ wǒmen de jiàzhíguān hé piānjiàn jiànjiě qiángjiāgěi biérén de wēixiǎn。
要牢记把我们的价值观和偏见见解强加给别人的危险。
Evidence should only be excluded if its probative value was outweighed by its prejudicial effect.
Rúguǒ zhèngjù de piānjiàn zuòyòng chāoguò qí zhèngmínglì，nàme zhǐnéng zuòfèi。
如果证据的偏见作用超过其证明力，那么只能作废。
The reporter\'s coverage resulted in prejudicial publicity for the defendant.
Gāi jìzhě de bàodào dǎozhì duì bèigào yǒu piānjiàn de xuānchuán。
该记者的报道导致对被告有偏见的宣传。
Prejudice is the holding of unconsidered opinions.
Piānjiàn shì lǔmǎng guāndiǎn de zhīchēng。
偏见是鲁莽观点的支撑。
Jealousy had jaundiced his judgment.
Jídù shǐ tā de pànduàn chǎnshēng piānjiàn。
嫉妒使他的判断产生偏见。
vary from established patterns of behavior. See Synonyms at different
从已经建立的行为模式偏离参见
Their political views are right of centre.
他们的政治见解总是中间偏右。

下午约四点钟的时候，我们看见了陆地，就在向南偏西的方向朝我们这边移动，据估计，它离我们只有10里之远。

Jù kēxué fāxiàn：dìqiú cíchǎngjí zhèngzài fāshēng huǎnmàn de piānyí。
Scientific discoveries say that the earth\'s pole is drifting off slowly course.
偏僻小镇，行旅极少。
This article couldn\'t be farther from the truth.
Zhè piān wénzhāng jíqí piānlí shìshí。
这篇文章极其偏离事实。
He missed the ball by a mile.
Tā yǐ jídà de piānchā lòuguòle qiú。
他以极大的偏差漏过了球。
意见偏激
yìjiàn piānjī
hold extreme views
他这个人比较偏激。
Tā zhège rén bǐjiào piānjī。
He tends to go to extremes.
克服偏激情绪
思想偏激。
His treatment of the race question is badly biased.
Tā duìdài zhǒngzú wèntí fēicháng piānjī。
他对待种族问题非常偏激。
I\'m very partial to ice cream.
Wǒ hěn piān\'ài bīngjīlíng。
我很偏爱冰激凌。
不偏护任何一方
bùpiānhù rènhé yìfāng
show no partiality to either side; be impartial; be unbiased
经济增长与环境保护，二者不可偏废。
Jīngjì zēngzhǎng yǔ huánjìngbǎohù，èrzhěbùkěpiānfèi.
Economic growth and environmental protection should be given equal emphasis.
你太偏心眼儿了，老护着他。
你告诉我他到外地去了，可偏好我昨天看到他了。
Nǐ gàosù wǒ tā dào wàidì qù le，kě piānhǎo wǒ zuótiān kàndào tā le。
You told me he was out of town, but as it happened, I saw him yesterday.
他对臭豆腐有特别的偏好。
Tā duì chòudòufu yǒu tèbié de piānhào。
He has a partiality for strong-smelling preserved bean curd.
他住的地方不很偏僻，应该好找。
Tā zhù de dìfāng bùhěnpiānpì，yīnggāi hǎo zhǎo。
His living place is not remote, and is easy to find.
我们好言相劝你偏不听，出什么差错你自己负责。
Wǒmen hǎoyán xiāngquàn nǐ piān bùtīng，chū shénme chācuò nǐ zìjǐ fùzé。
You will be responsible for any problem, because you do not listen to our well-intentioned words.
这孩子是个长跑的好苗子，教练何不给他吃点偏饭？
Zhè háizi shì gè chángpǎo de hǎo miáozi，jiàoliàn hébùgěi tā chī diǎn piānfàn? 
The child has great potential for long-distance running. Why doesn\'t the coach give him some special training?
他偏好天文学。
Each species has a tendency to stay in a particular area in the forest.
Gè gè wùzhǒng dōu yǒu zài sēnlín mǒu yí tèdìng qūyù shēngzhǎng de piānhào。
各个物种都有在森林某一特定区域生长的偏好。
